T02TD2453E:92b-1: yo ga sarba tatv'a au mu tram a'a lo ka n'a ma bi ka la badzra g'i ta /
T02TD2453E:92b-3: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur /
T02TD2453E:92b-4: bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2453E:92b-5: rgyu sems can la 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i lam tshogs gnyis las phyir gyur pa med la /
T02TD2453E:92b-6: bsod nams tshogs kyi mthar thug ni chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2453E:92b-7: de bskor ba'i gnas ni skye bos bgrod pa dka' ba'i sa phyogs /
T02TD2453E:92b-8: 'byung po ro langs rgyu ba'i srang /
T02TD2453E:92b-9: 'jig rten gyi mi ma yin rgyu ba'i sa /
T02TD2453E:92b-10: mthong ba tsam gyis bdud ba spu ldang zhing srin po skyi g-ya' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas /
T02TD2453E:92b-11: dur khrod chen po brgyad du rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams dang /
T02TD2453E:92b-12: chos nyid skye ba med pa la blo 'byangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams rab tu tshogs nas /
T02TD2453E:92b-13: rang rang gi rgyud la don dam pa'i bden pa 'jug pa'i yul nges pa'i shes pa gad la skyes pa dang /
T02TD2453E:92b-14: gnyug mngon gyi lhan cig skyes pa rang la gnas pa'i ye shes ngo gang la sprad pa dang /
T02TD2453E:92b-15: rtog pa gang gi sgo nas shar ba de tshogs kyi mchod pa byin gyis rlob pa la nyams myong gi mgur bzhengs pa /
T02TD2453E:92b-16: gnas de dang de na gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma su kha ta skal ba bzang mo la sogs pa rnams kyis mi bsnyel ba'i gzungs kyis phyi rabs kyi don du yi ge rigs su dkar shog la btab pa 'di rnams so //
T02TD2453E:92b-17: dka' thub mthar phyin pa l'u yi pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:92b-19: bya ba ma mang thar lam 'gag /'dod pa'i blo bral bya ba'i yul //
T02TD2453E:92b-20: sa phyogs de na byang chub nye //
T02TD2453E:92b-22: bde ba'i mdangs ldan ma shr'i su kha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:92b-23: 'jig rten bya ba bdud kyi yul //
T02TD2453E:92b-25: 'dod pa'i dug sbrul gtses pa yis //
T02TD2453E:92b-26: rjes ni sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:92b-28: nor bu gling pa la li ta badzra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:92b-29: ting 'dzin shes rab dri ma sel //
T02TD2453E:92b-30: rang rig ye shes 'od gsal sku //
T02TD2453E:92b-31: bde ba thob byed dbang gi lam //
T02TD2453E:92b-32: mngon du gyur tshe rtog pa grol //
T02TD2453E:93a-1: chags lam du slong ba mo tsandra bi ma la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93a-2: shes rab rno ngar ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2453E:93a-3: ma mthong 'khor ba'i sgrog mi chod //
T02TD2453E:93a-4: rin chen dbang gi nus pa yis //
T02TD2453E:93a-5: zag pa bde chen nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:93a-7: nus pa'i mthar thug b'i rya ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93a-9: dug lnga med na ye shes 'gag /'dod yon lam khyer sa lam 'dums //
T02TD2453E:93a-10: spangs nas grol 'dod dman pa'i lam //
T02TD2453E:93a-12: zad zing gi sbyin bdag mo ru ru su ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93a-13: drang srong shes rab mig can gyis //
T02TD2453E:93a-14: nad gzhi lus kyi zungs su bsgyur //
T02TD2453E:93a-15: de bzhin thabs dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD2453E:93a-16: dug lngas ye shes skyed par byed //
T02TD2453E:93a-18: 'gro ba'i mgon po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93a-19: rmi lam rang bzhin med pa bzhin //
T02TD2453E:93a-20: chos rnams rang gi ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:93a-22: don la grub pa ma yin no //
T02TD2453E:93a-24: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pa'i dzny'a na dha ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93a-25: ngo bos stod pa snang ba'i mtshang //
T02TD2453E:93a-26: gang la rang bzhin med pa yi //
T02TD2453E:93a-27: brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2453E:93a-28: zung 'jug ma mthong grol mi nus //
T02TD2453E:93a-30: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93a-31: snga nas ma dran rdo rje'i gdan //
T02TD2453E:93a-32: smra bar ma nus yid 'pham pa //
T02TD2453E:93a-33: 'od gsal 'gro 'ong med pa'i bdag / gnyis snang grol ba phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:93a-35: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor ma aa nu ki ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93a-36: dangs ma snang stong rkyen dang bral //
T02TD2453E:93a-37: tshogs drug yul du ma bcad pa'i //
T02TD2453E:93a-39: dran brjed mtshams su sems ngal sos //
T02TD2453E:93a-41: ri khrod dbang phyug sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93a-42: 'khrul pa rkyen snang glo bur ba //
T02TD2453E:93a-43: dus gsum skye 'jig gis stong pa //
T02TD2453E:93a-44: gzhi la ma grub ngo mtshar yul //
T02TD2453E:93a-45: de mthong ba ni grol ba'i yul //
T02TD2453E:93a-47: skyabs kyi sbyin bdag mo su ka bha'u'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93a-48: dran rig rnam par rtog pa ni //
T02TD2453E:93a-49: ma rig pa yi stobs las 'byung //
T02TD2453E:93a-50: sna tshogs med shar ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:93a-51: rtsa bral nam mkha'i rjes thob can //
T02TD2453E:93b-0: mi las 'das pa a'arya de ba'i @93b zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93b-1: 'od gsal gdod nas dag pa'i dang //
T02TD2453E:93b-2: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'i //
T02TD2453E:93b-3: rang gnas rtsa ba 'dus ma byas //
T02TD2453E:93b-4: spros bral 'di ni gzigs mor che //
T02TD2453E:93b-6: dran pa gcig pa'i rnal 'byor ma bha su ri ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93b-7: kun la khyab pa 'od gsal dang //
T02TD2453E:93b-9: spros bral dus rnams thams cad pa //
T02TD2453E:93b-12: smra ba'i seng ge ka la aa le ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93b-13: grub mtha'i lta ba ming du brjod //
T02TD2453E:93b-14: ming rnams rnam par rtog pa ste //
T02TD2453E:93b-15: de nyid stong pa chos kyi sku //
T02TD2453E:93b-16: ming las grol ba phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:93b-18: rtse gcig gi rnal 'byor ma ka ri dha ri ma'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93b-19: bde gshegs btsun mo ming med ma //
T02TD2453E:93b-21: smra bsam blo yi yul las 'das / gnyis snang za zhing nam mkha' 'jo //
T02TD2453E:93b-22: de mthong bas ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:93b-24: blo gros mi bzad pa sh'anta de ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93b-25: tshe 'di'i blo log thar pa'i lam //
T02TD2453E:93b-27: dus gsum chig chog gnad kyi mtshang //
T02TD2453E:93b-28: dri med rang snang phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:93b-30: chos kyi sbyin bdag mo aa nu t'a ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93b-31: go cha 'jig rten pa yi sgrog / ma grol 'phags lam zin mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:93b-32: de srid bde ba dang mi 'phrad //
T02TD2453E:93b-33: rang snang dag tshe zhing khams 'char //
T02TD2453E:93b-35: brtul zhugs mthar phyin dombi pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93b-36: dmigs pas ched du ma bzung ba'i //
T02TD2453E:93b-37: shes pa yul las ma 'phros pa //
T02TD2453E:93b-38: bde gsal mi rtog dri ma med //
T02TD2453E:93b-39: dangs ma yid 'bral la phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:93b-41: 'dod pa la blo log pa rnal 'byor ma dzny'a na bi ma la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93b-42: sgom blo'i 'dun pa dri ma ste //
T02TD2453E:93b-43: rig pa so la bzhag pa yi //
T02TD2453E:93b-44: ma byas shes pa skyon las grol //
T02TD2453E:93b-45: 'dzin rtog dmigs pa'i steng du ni //
T02TD2453E:93b-48: shes rab spyan ldan ka ma la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:93b-49: dngos don rang rig ye shes kyi //
T02TD2453E:93b-50: lhan cig skyes pa'i nyams myong ni //
T02TD2453E:93b-51: tshig gi spyod yul ma yin te //
T02TD2453E:94a-1: yis mtshon pa seng ge'i gsung //
T02TD2453E:94a-3: bdag med kyi sgra sgrogs ma padma dha nu'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94a-4: gnyug ma ngo bo nyid kyi gshis //
T02TD2453E:94a-5: blo yi yul na gnas pa min //
T02TD2453E:94a-6: mtshon du yod la ngos gzung bral //
T02TD2453E:94a-7: yang dag bla ma'i brda las rig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:94a-8: 'khrul pa'i sgrog grol ba bhi na pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94a-9: ji ltar chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin //
T02TD2453E:94a-10: snang ba'i rang mtshang ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:94a-12: der 'dzin grol bas phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:94a-14: sdom pa'i tshul khrims can me kha la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94a-15: ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer bzhin //
T02TD2453E:94a-16: chos rnams rang bzhin brtags na dben //
T02TD2453E:94a-17: bden zad brdzun zad yi ge zad //
T02TD2453E:94a-18: tshig gi lam chad blo las 'das //
T02TD2453E:94a-20: sbas pa'i rnal 'byor go raksha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94a-21: rtog pa yid bzhin nor bu la /
T02TD2453E:94a-22: goms 'dris phyi bdar byas pa yis //
T02TD2453E:94a-23: brtan pa thob pa mdog phyin te //
T02TD2453E:94a-26: 'khor ba'i yid phyung ba mo ku ma la s'urya'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94a-27: rang snang sprin rum ma dangs na //
T02TD2453E:94a-29: rnam rtog rgyang du ma bsrings na //
T02TD2453E:94a-30: ye shes nye ru mi 'dod do //
T02TD2453E:94a-32: rlung la dbang phyug pa tso bo ri ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94a-33: zung 'jug gnas pa'i yi ge ni //
T02TD2453E:94a-34: 'gros kyi rnam shes yi ge sel //
T02TD2453E:94a-35: nyams myong gsal bas bdag 'dzin zhig /'di yis nyams kyi 'phen len 'jig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:94a-36: dpal mi'i seng ge'i spyod pa can au mu ka ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94a-37: bde chen chos dang sprul pa yi //
T02TD2453E:94a-38: 'khor lo gsum gyi lte ba la //
T02TD2453E:94a-39: gnas pa'i yi ge bde gshegs kyi //
T02TD2453E:94a-40: ma lus kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
T02TD2453E:94a-42: brda la rang ngo mthong ba na du ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94a-43: snying gi dbus su ngo sprad pa'i //
T02TD2453E:94a-44: bla mas bstan pa mchog gi don //
T02TD2453E:94a-45: lhun grub rang ngo shes pa ni //
T02TD2453E:94a-46: gnad de nges pa'i shes pas mthong //
T02TD2453E:94a-48: dge ba'i chos sdud tshul khrims can bha tsa la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94a-49: bzhi rdzogs rang byung ye shes su //
T02TD2453E:94a-50: tshos ma'i rkyen la rag mi las //
T02TD2453E:94b-0: rang rig 'od @94b gsal dngos po'i gshis //
T02TD2453E:94b-1: rten 'brel gang gi thabs kyi sa rig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:94b-2: lung rigs gnyer gyi dbang phyug te pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94b-3: bla ma'i gsung gas ldongs pa bsal //
T02TD2453E:94b-4: de mthong ming gi sde snod la //
T02TD2453E:94b-5: bltas tshe gdams par ma gyur pa'i //
T02TD2453E:94b-6: yi ge gcig kyang bor du med //
T02TD2453E:94b-8: gsal ba'i mdangs ldan ma karma li ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94b-9: nam mkha' dbyings kyi glegs bam la /
T02TD2453E:94b-10: dkar dmar sna tshogs yi ge rnams //
T02TD2453E:94b-11: rnam rtog 'khrul pa blo yi chos //
T02TD2453E:94b-12: don la glegs bam yi ges stong //
T02TD2453E:94b-14: bde ba lam khyer thabs la byed pa danti ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94b-15: nang gros phyi yi rkyen zhu bas //
T02TD2453E:94b-16: rtsol ba ma byas dang gis su //
T02TD2453E:94b-17: khams 'dus rang la gnas pa yis //
T02TD2453E:94b-18: ye shes shar bas las las grol //
T02TD2453E:94b-20: bde ba lam du slong ba na ka ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94b-21: rmi lam dbang gis sgo nga ru //
T02TD2453E:94b-22: grol lam bskyed rdzogs 'dab gshog rgyas //
T02TD2453E:94b-23: mos gus dad pas sbubs phye pas //
T02TD2453E:94b-24: ma rig 'khrul pa'i rgya las grol //
T02TD2453E:94b-26: rtog pa byin rlabs las shar ba ca ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94b-27: mchog gi nor bu rin po che //
T02TD2453E:94b-28: snying la bcangs pa'i brtse gdung gis //
T02TD2453E:94b-29: dpal gyi gter mdzod yongs su 'gengs //
T02TD2453E:94b-30: grogs dag nor bu'i gces 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2453E:94b-32: sems can gyi don byed tshul can bhi ka la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94b-33: ded dpon med par rgya mtsho yi //
T02TD2453E:94b-34: mchog gi gling don mi 'grub bzhin //
T02TD2453E:94b-35: yon tan du mas rab brgyan kyang //
T02TD2453E:94b-36: bla ma med par srid mthar min //
T02TD2453E:94b-38: rtog pa shing bzo la shar ba kha pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94b-39: dngos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2453E:94b-40: bden med ltos dang 'khrul pa 'jig /'khor ba'i mtshang mthong rang bzhin med //
T02TD2453E:94b-41: spang bya ma rnyed gnyen po stor //
T02TD2453E:94b-43: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes khong du chud pa mo rdzu nu ta ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:94b-44: 'khor ba ma grub gzhi yis stong //
T02TD2453E:94b-45: myang 'das ma grub blo yis stong //
T02TD2453E:94b-46: sa lam ma grub bden pas stong //
T02TD2453E:94b-47: 'bras bu ma grub yul gyis stong //
T02TD2453E:95a-1: dang bral ba ka na pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95a-2: gzhi med rtsa ba bral ba yis //
T02TD2453E:95a-3: chos rnams gdod nas stong ba las //
T02TD2453E:95a-5: 'bras bu ma mthong nyams len grol //
T02TD2453E:95a-7: sems la dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor ma ga da ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95a-8: ji ltar chu shing sdong po la //
T02TD2453E:95a-9: nam zhig snying po yod gyur che //
T02TD2453E:95a-10: de yi dus su gsal ba las //
T02TD2453E:95a-11: 'bras bu gzhan du mthong ba min //
T02TD2453E:95a-13: ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa ka na ra'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2453E:95a-14: phyi rol lha yi byin rlabs min //
T02TD2453E:95a-15: nang du rig pa dangs las 'byung ;
T02TD2453E:95a-17: rig pa dangs pa'i stobs las ni //
T02TD2453E:95a-20: sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa badzra siddhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95a-21: man shel ma dag phyi rol rkyen //
T02TD2453E:95a-22: mi 'jug g-ya' dag ngos der ni //
T02TD2453E:95a-23: sna tshogs dar gyi kha dog len //
T02TD2453E:95a-24: sems pa'i las kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2453E:95a-26: de kho na nyid snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las ma rig pa sgo nga'i sbubs rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o /
T02TD2453E:95a-28: // / yi ge lam du 'khyer ba ta ka na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95a-29: mtha' bzhi las ni grol ba yi //
T02TD2453E:95a-30: sangs rgyas skye 'gag dri ma bral //
T02TD2453E:95a-31: rnam par rtog med bde gsal dang //
T02TD2453E:95a-32: gnyis snang bral ba phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:95a-34: rtog pa rang grol gyi rnal 'byor ma hu lu ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95a-35: gang gis ma bcos ma bslad pa //
T02TD2453E:95a-36: dbyer med dbyings su gcig pa yi //
T02TD2453E:95a-37: chos kyi sku yis kun la khyab //
T02TD2453E:95a-38: rnam rtog gis bcings mngon mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:95a-40: bden pa gzigs pa ti lo pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95a-41: dran rtog tha mal shes pa ni //
T02TD2453E:95a-43: dran rig ldang rlung bde ba bcad //
T02TD2453E:95a-44: de tshe shes pa yul mi gso //
T02TD2453E:95a-46: chu bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor pa ma ti la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95a-47: lha yi lus kyis tha mal gyi //
T02TD2453E:95a-48: rtog pa yang ni bden par byed //
T02TD2453E:95a-49: rlung gi ngag la bde ba yis //
T02TD2453E:95a-50: yid kyi tha mal shes pa spong //
T02TD2453E:95b-0: bla ma'i byin rlabs zhugs pa n'a ro @95b pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95b-1: dpal ldan yon tan kun gyi gzhi //
T02TD2453E:95b-3: mos gus med par byin brlabs la //
T02TD2453E:95b-6: gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa karma ka ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95b-7: rang gi don du chos kyi sku //
T02TD2453E:95b-8: gzhan gyi don du gzugs sku gnyis //
T02TD2453E:95b-9: bla ma'i dus thabs bsten las byung //
T02TD2453E:95b-10: 'di med mchog gi dngos grub stor //
T02TD2453E:95b-12: nus pa la thugs rjes brgyan pa sa li pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95b-13: byams pa snying rje byang chub sems //
T02TD2453E:95b-14: 'di med byang chub mchog gi lam //
T02TD2453E:95b-15: nam du yang ni phrad mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:95b-16: grogs dag gces pa dor mi bya //
T02TD2453E:95b-18: bde ba'i gos kyis dros ta ra aa ling gi zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95b-19: phan bde'i sa bon bskrun pa'i gzhi //
T02TD2453E:95b-20: byams pa'i sa gzhi snying rje chu //
T02TD2453E:95b-21: bangs pa'i ser la byang sems kyi //
T02TD2453E:95b-22: myu gu skye 'gyur gzhan du min //
T02TD2453E:95b-24: spros bral sgra 'gros la shar ba tsa ta la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95b-25: rno la dar chags drag po'i mig / gsal dangs phyar bas bying rmugs sel //
T02TD2453E:95b-26: rtog pa chod rjes chos nyid kyis //
T02TD2453E:95b-27: rang ngo rjes kyi shes pa zin //
T02TD2453E:95b-29: tshe 'di'i so tshis zhig pa aa nu si ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95b-30: res gsor rje ba dum bu'i 'gros //
T02TD2453E:95b-32: brjes pas nang phrad ngos gzung bral //
T02TD2453E:95b-33: des ni gnyug ma'i rang ngo mthong //
T02TD2453E:95b-35: dpa' gdeng lam du khyer ba bhi ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95b-36: lhan cig skyes pa seng ge'i gsang //
T02TD2453E:95b-37: smra bsam blo yi yul ma yin //
T02TD2453E:95b-39: rang rig spros bral phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:95b-41: zab mo'i chos la bzod pa ru pa ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95b-42: gnyug ma rang la gnas pa yi //
T02TD2453E:95b-43: ye shes khu ba 'thungs pa'i ros //
T02TD2453E:95b-44: myos pa gyad kyi spyod lam 'dzin //
T02TD2453E:95b-45: gdeng ldan 'khor ba'i g-ya' dang bral //
T02TD2453E:95b-47: mi'i khyu mchog te kho na ti pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:95b-48: sna tshogs rkyen las shar ba yi //
T02TD2453E:95b-49: snang ba'i chos rnams stong pa las //
T02TD2453E:95b-50: ma 'das rang gi ngo bos dben //
T02TD2453E:95b-51: gnyis med de ni phyag rgya che//
T02TD2453E:96a-1: gtsang sme dor ba phag gi spyod pa can bi ga ma'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96a-2: dngos po sna tshogs sems nyid de //
T02TD2453E:96a-3: snang ba las ni gzhan 'gyur pa'i //
T02TD2453E:96a-4: phyi rol don ni yod ma yin //
T02TD2453E:96a-5: chu bo'i mthong snang de yis shes //
T02TD2453E:96a-7: bdag nyid chen po aa lu ki'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96a-8: gdol pa'i lag na mtshon thogs bzhin //
T02TD2453E:96a-9: tsan ta li yi rtog pa 'joms //
T02TD2453E:96a-10: bde gsal pheng gis gzung ba yis //
T02TD2453E:96a-11: dri med dangs ma sems la 'phel //
T02TD2453E:96a-13: pheng gi sgra sgrog sa ma bhi tu ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96a-14: bung ba'i sgra skad pheng gi dbyangs //
T02TD2453E:96a-15: dpal gyi be'u'i nang na sgrogs //
T02TD2453E:96a-17: sems pa'i 'od zer yid pham byed //
T02TD2453E:96a-19: lta stangs lam du khyer ba la bya de ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96a-20: srid gsum mi g-yo ye shes kyi //
T02TD2453E:96a-21: skye ba'i zhing ni bcing ba'i gdan //
T02TD2453E:96a-22: phra rags gcod pa ka ra na //
T02TD2453E:96a-23: dpal gyi rdo rje'i mig las 'khrungs //
T02TD2453E:96a-25: go cha'i brtson 'grus can su ka ma la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96a-26: g-yas su mnyam par bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2453E:96a-27: de yi thugs rjes g-yon du gzung //
T02TD2453E:96a-28: mdun du rnam par lta ba ni //
T02TD2453E:96a-29: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD2453E:96a-31: mi rtog pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa ratna aa ling gi zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96a-32: thabs kyis ma chun shes rab kyis //
T02TD2453E:96a-33: lam mi 'dod de shes rab kyis //
T02TD2453E:96a-34: ma zin thabs kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2453E:96a-37: sbyangs pa'i las can ka dha pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96a-38: thabs kyi gzhu la shes rab mda' //
T02TD2453E:96a-39: ma bral dad pas bskul ba yi //
T02TD2453E:96a-40: bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags pas //
T02TD2453E:96a-41: dam pa gnyis ni thob par byed //
T02TD2453E:96a-43: 'gyu pa stod la gnon pa ka ma la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96a-44: rig pa sor bzhag rgyal sa 'dzin //
T02TD2453E:96a-46: shes pa gzengs smad rma bya'i mig / don gyi gnad rig der 'dzin pas //
T02TD2453E:96a-47: dam pa gnyis ni thob par byed //
T02TD2453E:96a-49: nga rgyal lam du slong ba mo kun ma si ta mo'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96a-50: mdun du zug pas rtsa ba zin //
T02TD2453E:96a-51: blug pa'i lta stangs rkyen mi g-yo //
T02TD2453E:96b-0: mthong @96b mthong rma byas gzhan snang 'gags //
T02TD2453E:96b-1: shes pa chig tshugs mi rtog lam //
T02TD2453E:96b-3: bsong nams kyi tshogs lam du khyer ba'i d'a ki sa la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96b-4: rdul med zhabs la bsnyen bkur ba'i //
T02TD2453E:96b-5: rnam par smin pa skar mda' bzhin //
T02TD2453E:96b-6: ma rig mun sel sprin bral lam //
T02TD2453E:96b-7: der ni dpal gyi be'u mthong //
T02TD2453E:96b-9: sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa bha ri dha ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96b-10: mchog gi nor bu rin po che //
T02TD2453E:96b-11: yid la dran pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD2453E:96b-12: 'khor pa'i rgyun chags rab bcom nas //
T02TD2453E:96b-13: bla med byang chub thob par byed //
T02TD2453E:96b-15: 'khrul pa rkyen thog tu grol ba bha do de ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96b-16: rtog pa thugs phrad yul mi dmigs //
T02TD2453E:96b-17: shes pa so mas 'khrul pa sel //
T02TD2453E:96b-18: rig pa yul rjes mi 'brang ba'i //
T02TD2453E:96b-19: chig chod ye shes skye pa'i rten //
T02TD2453E:96b-21: me long lta bu'i ye shes khong du chud pa mo so ri sam gha pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96b-22: dran snang chig chod so ma'i rtsal //
T02TD2453E:96b-23: 'khrul pa'i snang ba thugs phrad sel //
T02TD2453E:96b-24: dmigs med rten bral 'dzin pa'i rten //
T02TD2453E:96b-25: rig pa sor bzhag rgyal sa 'dzin //
T02TD2453E:96b-27: 'dod pa'i blo log tandha ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96b-28: sgrub pa 'dod blo mi zhugs pa'i //
T02TD2453E:96b-29: dmigs med 'khor gsum dag pa'i lam //
T02TD2453E:96b-30: 'bras bu re ltos bdud kyi yul //
T02TD2453E:96b-31: mchog don spu ris med pas 'grub //
T02TD2453E:96b-33: sgyu lus kyi rnal 'byor ma kundha li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96b-35: bya ba rnams la 'dod pa med //
T02TD2453E:96b-36: de bzhin 'dod pa'i blo bral ba //
T02TD2453E:96b-39: nam mkha' lam du 'khyer ba ku ku ri pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96b-40: nam mkha'i bdud rtsi byung ba yis //
T02TD2453E:96b-41: grub mtha'i 'dod pa ji snyed tshem //
T02TD2453E:96b-42: ma bcos rnal ma'i steng du ni //
T02TD2453E:96b-43: rig pa mdung tshugs 'dzin rtog grol //
T02TD2453E:96b-45: yongs su mthar phyin pa'i brtson 'grus can badzra bi ma la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:96b-46: shes pa tha mal yul mi dmigs //
T02TD2453E:96b-47: gnyug ma'i ngo bo 'dzin rtog med //
T02TD2453E:96b-48: zhen med rang grol ngo bo gshis //
T02TD2453E:96b-49: rnal 'byor ma yi gzigs mo sa //
T02TD2453E:96b-51: rnal 'byor pa su ka dha nu'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97a-2: snang bag cung la bor ba yis //
T02TD2453E:97a-3: rang nyid nyams myong 'gyur med gsal //
T02TD2453E:97a-4: ngo bo mthong tshe rang snang grol //
T02TD2453E:97a-6: 'od gsal rang ngo phrad pa dharma bha dra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97a-7: sems nyid 'od gsal dngos bo'i don //
T02TD2453E:97a-8: rang bzhin ngo bos sangs rgyas rgyu //
T02TD2453E:97a-9: dmigs med gdod nas dag pa yi //
T02TD2453E:97a-10: ye shes de mthong ma rig sel //
T02TD2453E:97a-12: du ma ro gcig gi rnal 'byor pa bha ta li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97a-13: ngo bo spros bral dri ma med //
T02TD2453E:97a-14: 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas //
T02TD2453E:97a-15: shel gong 'dam gyis gos pa bzhin //
T02TD2453E:97a-18: mnyam gzhag dangs pa ma ti pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97a-19: snying gi dbus su dran pa'i gling //
T02TD2453E:97a-20: pha wang mig gis rab tu 'dzin //
T02TD2453E:97a-21: yul snang mi dmigs phra rags 'gags //
T02TD2453E:97a-22: ma bcos rang lugs spros bral lam //
T02TD2453E:97a-24: yon tan mngon par grub pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pa ma aa re ta la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97a-25: ka ra na bcings lcags sgrog gis //
T02TD2453E:97a-26: srid pa gsum po g-yo mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:97a-27: rgyal po brtson du bzung ba yis //
T02TD2453E:97a-30: yul snang sgyu mar ngos zin pa aa bhi ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97a-31: rus sbal mig gis rnam rtog bcad //
T02TD2453E:97a-32: de dus chos rnams nam mkha'i dang //
T02TD2453E:97a-33: rjes thob yul snang rang bzhin med //
T02TD2453E:97a-34: bden med mthong bas 'khrul pa grol //
T02TD2453E:97a-36: ting 'dzin zas kyis 'tsho ba'i rnal 'byor ma tsanda ba ma la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97a-37: gyen gyi lta stangs tshangs pa'i gsang //
T02TD2453E:97a-38: dbang po rang snang phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:97a-39: chos nyid ngo bo thabs kyis zin //
T02TD2453E:97a-40: spros bral 'char ba yi ge'i gnad //
T02TD2453E:97a-42: gzhan don la bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba sa ha la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97a-43: pha dang ma ru ma gyur pa'i //
T02TD2453E:97a-44: srid pa gsum na sems can med //
T02TD2453E:97a-45: bde med 'khor bar gnas pa la //
T02TD2453E:97a-46: snying rje mi skye smyon pa yin //
T02TD2453E:97a-48: bsgrub pa lhur 'dzin mo ru ru su ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97a-49: spros bral 'char ba gsang gi gnad //
T02TD2453E:97a-50: 'phags lam gzhung ni byang chub sems //
T02TD2453E:97b-0: @97b gzhan don lhur blangs rang don rdzogs //
T02TD2453E:97b-1: 'di la dngos grub nye bar gnas //
T02TD2453E:97b-3: rtsa rlung las su rung ba ni la pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97b-4: dran rtog 'od gsal la bcings pas //
T02TD2453E:97b-5: rang rig ye shes lnga yi mdangs //
T02TD2453E:97b-6: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' yi //
T02TD2453E:97b-7: snang ba rgyu lam 'bras bu'i rtags //
T02TD2453E:97b-9: mi g-yo ba'i bsam gtan dzny'a na dha ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97b-10: dangs ma'i 'od zer du bar snang //
T02TD2453E:97b-11: smig rgyu ltar snang bde ba'i 'od //
T02TD2453E:97b-12: gsal ba srin bu me khyer 'ong //
T02TD2453E:97b-13: mi rtog 'od zer mkha' ltar snang //
T02TD2453E:97b-15: de kho na nyid rab tu snang dang rdo rje'i mgur las gser gyi nyi ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
T02TD2453E:97b-17: // / dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag aindra bhu ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97b-19: zhe sdang gis ni gsal ba sbor //
T02TD2453E:97b-20: gti mug gis ni mi rtog 'babs //
T02TD2453E:97b-21: nga rgyal phrag dog yon tan rgyu //
T02TD2453E:97b-23: lha'i rgyal po de ba ra mi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97b-24: grong khyer rnams kyi mi gtsang lud //
T02TD2453E:97b-25: zhing la 'bru rnams skyed par byed //
T02TD2453E:97b-26: de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud la ni //
T02TD2453E:97b-27: nyon mongs kyis ni ye shes 'phel //
T02TD2453E:97b-28: snang ba rang grol de ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:97b-30: / gsang spyod mthar phyin me go ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97b-31: mchog gi dngos grub sbas pa'i lam //
T02TD2453E:97b-32: ma gsangs bgegs chen skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:97b-33: gang 'dir mngon sum med pa'i gzugs //
T02TD2453E:97b-36: nyin mtshan med pa ce spyang gi spyod pa can aa nu shri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97b-37: lha yi thig le ma bstan par //
T02TD2453E:97b-38: phyag rgya'i 'od zer phyir mi spro //
T02TD2453E:97b-39: rigs ngan gdol pa'i spyod lam gyis //
T02TD2453E:97b-42: na ba la rtog ba shar bkod ta ri tog tse pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97b-43: rtog pa spang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2453E:97b-44: mi mthun lam du bslang ba yis //
T02TD2453E:97b-46: thabs 'dis gnyen po'i bya ba stor //
T02TD2453E:97b-48: ae wam gi glu len pa de ba su kha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:97b-49: ji ltar nags la mched pa'i me //
T02TD2453E:97b-50: rlung gas rab tu sbor ba ltar //
T02TD2453E:97b-51: brtan pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor la//
T02TD2453E:98a-0: @98a * // de tshe rkyen ngan grogs su 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:98a-2: sems can don byed kyi bsam gtan dang ldan pa dha ra ni'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98a-3: yid kyi yul du gyur pa yi //
T02TD2453E:98a-4: blo snang ri mo su bas pa'i rjes //
T02TD2453E:98a-5: dran bas ma gos spu ris bral //
T02TD2453E:98a-6: dangs ma'i ye shes 'char ba'i sa //
T02TD2453E:98a-8: dus skad cig mas 'das par rtogs pa shar ba dza'a landha ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98a-9: mi rtog spros bral 'dus ma byas //
T02TD2453E:98a-10: rang bzhin med pas skye 'gag bral //
T02TD2453E:98a-11: gnyis snang grol ba'i de nyid ni //
T02TD2453E:98a-12: gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa'i dang //
T02TD2453E:98a-14: dga' ba'i mdangs ldan ma bi ka su ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98a-15: ma bcos shes rab 'byung ba'i sa //
T02TD2453E:98a-16: gnyis snang rkyen dang bral ba'i dbus //
T02TD2453E:98a-17: mtshan ma rang sar grol ba de //
T02TD2453E:98a-18: dran brjed mtshams su ma bu phrad //
T02TD2453E:98a-20: bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa r'a hu la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98a-21: dngos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2453E:98a-22: phug khrus tshe 'di'i mngon zhen bzlog / bden 'dzin grol ba 'khrul lam chad //
T02TD2453E:98a-23: des ni ye shes 'bar bar byed //
T02TD2453E:98a-25: phrag dog lam du slong ba mo dza ki ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98a-26: ngal ba don med tshe 'di'i ched //
T02TD2453E:98a-27: rtsol sgrub tshi chad sdug bsngal rgyu //
T02TD2453E:98a-28: don dam spyod lam ma spangs pa'i //
T02TD2453E:98a-31: 'ching ba las grol ba dharma pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98a-32: chos rnams ngo bo gzhi rtsa bral //
T02TD2453E:98a-33: gnyug ma rang ngo rtog pa yis //
T02TD2453E:98a-34: 'dam gyis ma gos dangs pa'i dang //
T02TD2453E:98a-35: gnas lugs snang stong rkyen dang bral //
T02TD2453E:98a-37: thos pa shes rab can dzo ki aa ling gi zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98a-38: sna tshogs rang bzhin med pa'i gshis //
T02TD2453E:98a-39: der ni gzhi lam 'bras gsum mnyam //
T02TD2453E:98a-40: snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni //
T02TD2453E:98a-41: de ni snang ba rang gis bstan //
T02TD2453E:98a-43: thugs rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa gser gling pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98a-45: yid bzhin nor 'dra byang chub sems //
T02TD2453E:98a-46: sangs rgyas ma bcos lhun grub sku //
T02TD2453E:98a-47: 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas //
T02TD2453E:98a-49: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes khong du chud pa padma bi ma la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98a-50: rtogs pa'i bum pa bzang po nas //
T02TD2453E:98a-51: ched 'dzin rtsol ba ma byas pa'i //
T02TD2453E:98a-52: chos kyi sku dang gzugs sku gnyis //
T02TD2453E:98a-53: rang gzhan don du dang gis 'byung //
T02TD2453E:98a-55: dran pa so la 'jog pa dho ka ri pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98a-56: rkyen phyir mi 'brang tshangs pa'i spyan //
T02TD2453E:98b-0: @98b dran pa sor gzhag der 'dzin bral //
T02TD2453E:98b-1: yengs pa'i shes pas yul mi 'dzin //
T02TD2453E:98b-2: ka ra na bcings bde ba'i stan //
T02TD2453E:98b-4: 'od gsal gyi rnal 'byor ma karma siddhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98b-5: 'jig rten gsum bdag gyen la blta //
T02TD2453E:98b-6: rdo rje gtsug tor spros bral dang //
T02TD2453E:98b-7: dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:98b-8: dbang po rang snang der ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:98b-10: rgyud rnam pa bzhi yis grol bas ga dza'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98b-11: thos pas grol ba tshig gi gnad //
T02TD2453E:98b-12: mthong bas chog pa dong yi gnad //
T02TD2453E:98b-13: 'dra man ma zhugs seng ge'i gsang //
T02TD2453E:98b-14: ru tra'i sel med smin rjes grol //
T02TD2453E:98b-16: bsam pa'i shes pa can sa li ta su ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98b-17: snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sgra //
T02TD2453E:98b-18: snying la zhen pa 'khrul pa 'jig / sgyu ma'i mtshang rig bden 'dzin bral //
T02TD2453E:98b-19: gser la ra med 'dod dgur bsgyur //
T02TD2453E:98b-21: grub chen brgyad ldan me di ni'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98b-22: byas pa don med sdug bsngal gyi //
T02TD2453E:98b-23: khur bor bde 'dod thar pa'i lam //
T02TD2453E:98b-24: sgrub pa nan tan dngos grub rgyu //
T02TD2453E:98b-25: yun du bsrings na mngon du 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:98b-27: dag rnam par dben pa'i rnal 'byor ma aa nu ki ri'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2453E:98b-28: rtsol sgrub mi chad 'bras bu stor //
T02TD2453E:98b-29: chu la thug srub thon mi bya //
T02TD2453E:98b-30: gser mtshon mthong ba'i sa la ni //
T02TD2453E:98b-31: ngal dung spangs na mngon du 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:98b-33: rtogs pa'i ye shes dbang nyams las shar ba gha dha pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98b-34: ma bcos zla ba tshes pa'i spyan //
T02TD2453E:98b-35: rnam pa'i lta stangs spros dang bral //
T02TD2453E:98b-36: 'jam pa'i rlung gzung gnyug ma'i dang //
T02TD2453E:98b-37: ye shes rgyud la 'char bar byed //
T02TD2453E:98b-39: bde chen zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor ma su ni dha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98b-41: des ni dangs gsal dri med 'dzin //
T02TD2453E:98b-42: phra rags mi mthong zla tshes mig / yul snang ma gzigs 'dzin rtog bral //
T02TD2453E:98b-44: bden pa gzigs pa aa dzu ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:98b-45: bla mas ngo sprad gnyug ma'i don //
T02TD2453E:98b-46: rgyud la 'jug pa byin rlabs mthu //
T02TD2453E:98b-47: rtogs na yon tan kun gyi gzhi //
T02TD2453E:99a-1: shes rab shr'i aa pa ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99a-2: khyud ni ma yi me drod kyis //
T02TD2453E:99a-3: shin tu sgo nga rgyas bar byed //
T02TD2453E:99a-4: dbugs kyang rgya las grol la khad //
T02TD2453E:99a-7: rtog pa mkha' 'gro brda las byung ba kampa la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99a-8: ji ltar dra ba dbang po'i gzhu //
T02TD2453E:99a-9: mkha' la shar pa 'byung ba'i dangs //
T02TD2453E:99a-10: snang la rang bzhin med pa'i bdag /'di yis chos rnams rang mtshan bstan //
T02TD2453E:99a-12: sems la dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor ma bhi nu ka ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99a-13: sna tshogs snang ba dngos po'i chos //
T02TD2453E:99a-14: rang gi ngo bo rnam par dben //
T02TD2453E:99a-15: ji ltar chu snang zla ba bzhin //
T02TD2453E:99a-16: khong du chud pas 'khrul pa 'jig / ces gsungs ngo //
T02TD2453E:99a-17: lta stangs lam du khyer ba kundha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99a-18: rno dar chags pa khyab 'jug mig / rkyen la gzigs pa gnyis snang 'joms //
T02TD2453E:99a-19: yul snang ma mthong nam mkha'i dbyings //
T02TD2453E:99a-20: der 'dzin grol bas spros dang bral //
T02TD2453E:99a-22: snang ba sgyu mar 'byongs pa legs smin ka ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99a-23: ku ma'i ri yi rnam pa la //
T02TD2453E:99a-24: mi gnyis mtshungs par bsnol mar blta //
T02TD2453E:99a-25: steng dang 'og gi rnam pa ni //
T02TD2453E:99a-26: de dus gang yang mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:99a-28: thos pas mtha' chod pa kasha na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99a-29: nges pa'i don mthong sgro 'dogs chod //
T02TD2453E:99a-30: mos gus phyin ci ma log pa'i //
T02TD2453E:99a-31: blo la khams rnams dang gis 'du //
T02TD2453E:99a-32: gcig la yon tan kun mtha' yas //
T02TD2453E:99a-34: rang gi skyon gcud ba la mkhas pa mo su ka bhi ru'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99a-35: thos dang sgom dang bsam pa'i mtha' //
T02TD2453E:99a-36: rig pa snyems dang bral bas 'bad //
T02TD2453E:99a-37: de yi rgyu ni yid ches te //
T02TD2453E:99a-38: rtsa ba mos gus mchog las byung //
T02TD2453E:99a-40: rang gnas kyi ye shes ngos zin pa ku li pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99a-41: sor bzhag dus gsum chig chod kyi //
T02TD2453E:99a-42: snang phyir mi 'brad dus gsum grol //
T02TD2453E:99a-43: rnal ma'i rang khang spros bral 'dzin //
T02TD2453E:99a-44: ma bcos pa ni chos kyi sku //
T02TD2453E:99a-46: ched du mi 'dzin smyon ma lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma dzany'a na bhi nu'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99a-47: rma bya rgya ru chud pa bzhin //
T02TD2453E:99b-0: rig @99b pa so la bzhag pa yis //
T02TD2453E:99b-1: bde ba gsal ba sgrog tu 'jug / rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:99b-3: rtogs pa'i ye shes dbang nyams la shar ba dza yinta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99b-4: ma yengs rig pa dran pa'i rtsis //
T02TD2453E:99b-5: spyod 'gros bzhi la bzung ba yis //
T02TD2453E:99b-6: bden pa zad pa don gyi gsang //
T02TD2453E:99b-7: mthong pas 'khrul pa yul la 'jig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:99b-8: ka ki dung 'bud ma aa au da ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99b-9: mchog don dran pa la ma chags //
T02TD2453E:99b-10: yengs pa'i sems la de nyid stong //
T02TD2453E:99b-11: gang la rang bzhin med pa yi //
T02TD2453E:99b-14: rtog pa glegs bam bltas pa la shar ba rtsa ba ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99b-15: yi ge bzhi yis bka' rgyud khrol //
T02TD2453E:99b-16: thub pa'i spyod lam rnam gsum gyis //
T02TD2453E:99b-17: bde gshegs lung gi rgyud pa zin //
T02TD2453E:99b-18: gnad rig gsang ba'i gter mdzod brtol //
T02TD2453E:99b-20: sems 'jug par byed pa la mkhas pa mo ku la tsanda'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99b-21: bdag med don mthong yul ngos der //
T02TD2453E:99b-22: chos rnams ma lus zad pa'i sa //
T02TD2453E:99b-23: rig byed 'dzin pa bram ze'i bu //
T02TD2453E:99b-24: gsang tshig pha yi gsung las rnyed //
T02TD2453E:99b-26: phra rags bcad pa tsam pa ka'i zhal snga nas rtsa dang rlung dang rig byed gsum //
T02TD2453E:99b-27: shes pa lung khyer spros bral gyis //
T02TD2453E:99b-28: steng du bcings pa gsang gi gnad //
T02TD2453E:99b-29: bshig rjes bde gsal mi rtog 'char //
T02TD2453E:99b-31: snying rje'i mdangs ldan ma shr'i siddhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99b-32: bde dang stong ba gsal ba'i nyams //
T02TD2453E:99b-33: rtog pa'i g-yo 'gul las grol ba //
T02TD2453E:99b-34: rig pa chig tshugs lam khyer gyis //
T02TD2453E:99b-35: lta stangs dor shul spros bral dang //
T02TD2453E:99b-37: 'gro rnams gzigs ba ri ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99b-38: gnyis med gnyis su snang ba yi //
T02TD2453E:99b-39: blo de 'khrul pa'i snang ba de //
T02TD2453E:99b-40: 'di yis srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor //
T02TD2453E:99b-41: snang ba rang grol de ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:99b-43: zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor ma dha ri su kha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:99b-44: ma dag dri ma can gyi blo //
T02TD2453E:99b-45: nya phyis 'od kyi snang ba la //
T02TD2453E:99b-46: dngul 'dzin shes pa skyes pa'i tshe //
T02TD2453E:99b-47: nya phyis dngul gyis stong par byos ;
T02TD2453E:100a-0: @100a * // de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las ye shes kyi mdangs rnam par dangs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o /
T02TD2453E:100a-2: // / spu ris yid la mi byed gtum ma la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100a-3: yul gyis ma bslad so ma'i rang //
T02TD2453E:100a-4: mdzod spu'i bar na dbang po dangs //
T02TD2453E:100a-5: snang ba rang grol yi ge mig /'di yis yid la byed pa 'jig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:100a-6: myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i thabs la mkhas pa me ti ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100a-7: yul gyi gsal cha ma 'gags la //
T02TD2453E:100a-8: shes pa der 'dzin bral ba can //
T02TD2453E:100a-9: rtog pa'i 'phen las rnam grol ba //
T02TD2453E:100a-10: smin ma'i mtshams na rab tu gnas //
T02TD2453E:100a-12: snang ba dpe char shar ba me kha la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100a-14: 'di la gdam ngag yul gyis ston //
T02TD2453E:100a-15: tshogs drug dpe char shar ba yi //
T02TD2453E:100a-16: rtogs pa'i rkyen bskul snang bas byed //
T02TD2453E:100a-18: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes thugs su chud pa mo bhi ma la si ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100a-19: lam gyi grogs su 'gyur ba ni //
T02TD2453E:100a-20: gcig tu ngas pa ma yin te //
T02TD2453E:100a-21: rtog pa'i rten du gang gyur pa //
T02TD2453E:100a-22: de ni las kyi phyag rgya yin //
T02TD2453E:100a-24: dmigs med nyams su myong ba ka li pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100a-25: mnyam gzhag mi bskyar bshig rjes blta //
T02TD2453E:100a-26: dmigs bral shes pa 'dzin las grol //
T02TD2453E:100a-27: de tshe dus kyi rjes mi 'brang //
T02TD2453E:100a-28: rnam rtog chos nyid dang du grol //
T02TD2453E:100a-30: gti mug lam slongs pa mo bha la ta'i zhal ;
T02TD2453E:100a-32: bying rgod bya ras ma slebs pa'i //
T02TD2453E:100a-33: gsal dangs phyed pa'i 'phro la bshig / rjes srong ba ni bsgom gyi gnang //
T02TD2453E:100a-34: 'di yis phra rags dri ma sel //
T02TD2453E:100a-36: brda la go ba longs pa ka na pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100a-37: rtsa ba rang do brda yis rtogs //
T02TD2453E:100a-38: nges pa bla ma'i gsung las skyes //
T02TD2453E:100a-39: don mthong bas ni sgro 'dogs chod //
T02TD2453E:100a-40: mkha' 'gro mthu yis bar chod sel //
T02TD2453E:100a-42: rang gi tshig rgyun du byed pa'i smon lam la gnas pa mo mo ha ri su ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100a-43: yang dag don la yi ge med //
T02TD2453E:100b-0: smra bsam brjod pa'i yul las @100b 'das //
T02TD2453E:100b-1: bla ma'i brda thabs che ba yis //
T02TD2453E:100b-4: rtog pa gru bzo la mkhas pa kanti pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100b-5: dmigs pa ma bcos blo rten zhig / mtshan ma rang grol sgom dang bral //
T02TD2453E:100b-6: 'dzin med spros bral rnam rtog nub //
T02TD2453E:100b-7: nyams len grol bas grol ba thob //
T02TD2453E:100b-9: sems rnam bar dben pa'i rnal 'byor ma sh'i ma nu ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100b-10: blo rtogs ma zhugs tha mal gyi //
T02TD2453E:100b-11: shes pa de nyid gnyug ma yi //
T02TD2453E:100b-12: rang kha bcos bslad dang bral ba //
T02TD2453E:100b-13: bsam du med do sgom dang bral //
T02TD2453E:100b-15: rang rig blo rten dang bral ba da'u ba ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100b-16: chos rnams gzhi yis stong pa'i sar //
T02TD2453E:100b-17: shes pa yul med blo rten shig / dbyings der rtog pa'i rtsa ba bra //
T02TD2453E:100b-18: yid la mi byed rtsol las 'das //
T02TD2453E:100b-20: gnyis med ye shes kyi rnal 'byor ma kam ka dha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100b-21: thog ma tha ma dbus mi dmigs //
T02TD2453E:100b-22: rig pa mkha' lding rten mi 'tshol //
T02TD2453E:100b-23: rtsa bral nam mkha'i rjes thob can //
T02TD2453E:100b-24: bsam med nyams myong dmigs dang bral //
T02TD2453E:100b-26: rnam rtog gzhi med du mthong ba au ti ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100b-27: chos rnams gzhi med skye 'gag grol //
T02TD2453E:100b-28: rtog bral blo yis ma gos pa //
T02TD2453E:100b-29: dri med mtshan ma rang sar dangs //
T02TD2453E:100b-30: rig pa gcer bu de ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:100b-32: sems kyi don dang rjes su 'bral par byed pa'i ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin ma shr'i si su ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100b-33: rig pa bsgrims nas glod pa yi //
T02TD2453E:100b-34: dang der phra rags rtog pa yal //
T02TD2453E:100b-35: spu ris med pa dran med dbyings //
T02TD2453E:100b-36: dri med ye shes 'char ba'i sa //
T02TD2453E:100b-38: gnyug ma srangs su chung pa kamba la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100b-39: yul gyi gsal cha ma 'gags pa'i //
T02TD2453E:100b-40: shes pa der 'dzin bral ba'i gnas //
T02TD2453E:100b-41: rtog pa'i yal sa sna yi rtse //
T02TD2453E:100b-42: ma yengs srangs der ye shes 'chang //
T02TD2453E:100b-44: smon lam la gnas pa mo na ru ta'i shal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:100b-45: ma skyes pa la 'chi ba med //
T02TD2453E:100b-46: chos rnams rang gi ngo bos dben //
T02TD2453E:100b-47: ma dran pa la brjed pa med //
T02TD2453E:101a-3: ngo sprad gnad la phog pa dha ka ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101a-4: yid la mi byed gnyug ma'i lam //
T02TD2453E:101a-5: spu ris ma dmigs rtog pa chad //
T02TD2453E:101a-6: blo rten dri ma snying la dag / rnam rtog chos nyid ngang du grol //
T02TD2453E:101a-8: chos brgyad dang bral ba mo shr'i dha ni'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101a-9: sna tshogs yul snang gzhi med du //
T02TD2453E:101a-10: phug khrus 'khrul pa yul las ldog / yengs med nam mkha' mdung tshugs kyi //
T02TD2453E:101a-11: srangs der rtog pa skye lam chad //
T02TD2453E:101a-13: rtog pa'i dri ma dag pa sa pa ka ra pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101a-14: rtog ba grol ba'i rjes thob ni //
T02TD2453E:101a-15: yid kyi spu ris ngos gzung bral //
T02TD2453E:101a-16: dmigs med dang der blo mtha' grol //
T02TD2453E:101a-17: gnyug ma ngos gzung med par sangs //
T02TD2453E:101a-19: 'khrul pa'i sgrog grol ba mo su kha siddhi'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2453E:101a-20: tshogs drug yul du ma spyad pa'i //
T02TD2453E:101a-21: dran med mya ngan 'das pa'i lam //
T02TD2453E:101a-22: rnam par mi rtog chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD2453E:101a-23: yid dang bral bas phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:101a-25: chags sdang grol ba sarba bha ga la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101a-26: gzung 'dzin lam gyi sa bon gyi //
T02TD2453E:101a-27: de nyid skye ba med pa'i ngang //
T02TD2453E:101a-28: chos rnams rtsa bral gzhi yis stong //
T02TD2453E:101a-31: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i smon lam la gnas pa mo badzra ha lu'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101a-32: rig pa bsgrims nas klod pa yis //
T02TD2453E:101a-33: dad der yid 'pham sems ngal sos //
T02TD2453E:101a-34: rtog pa chos nyid ngang du grol //
T02TD2453E:101a-35: de yis ye shes lnga rdzogs byed //
T02TD2453E:101a-37: gdams pa lha la gsan pa kampa la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101a-38: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2453E:101a-39: ngo bo chos skur grol gyur kyang //
T02TD2453E:101a-40: skye bos mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2453E:101a-41: rang gsal thabs kyis chod pa ni //
T02TD2453E:101a-42: bla ma dus thabs bsten par rig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:101a-43: rtog bral ro'i spyod pa can pu tra li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101a-44: 'jig rten bde sdug skyes pa'i rgyu //
T02TD2453E:101a-45: de ni las yin sems la bsags //
T02TD2453E:101a-46: de yi ngo bo yid kyi las //
T02TD2453E:101a-47: rig pa sems nyid gdod nas dag / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:101b-0: las @101b kyi sa bon bsregs pa su ka to'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101b-1: yengs na gnas pa'i bar du ni //
T02TD2453E:101b-2: rig pa so zin dran pa 'khyim [?] //
T02TD2453E:101b-3: ngo bo 'dzin rtog las grol ba //
T02TD2453E:101b-4: blo yi snang ba gzhi rtsa bral //
T02TD2453E:101b-6: ha ha ha'i gad rgyangs can aa ha ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101b-7: 'khor ba spangs pa'i pha rol na //
T02TD2453E:101b-8: mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin //
T02TD2453E:101b-9: 'khor ba rang bzhin med pa yi //
T02TD2453E:101b-12: 'gro ba thugs rjes 'dzin pa n'a ga bo dhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101b-13: ngo bo ci yang snang ba ste //
T02TD2453E:101b-14: rang bzhin cir yang ma yin no //
T02TD2453E:101b-15: mtshan nyid gzhi rtsa bral ba can //
T02TD2453E:101b-16: skye med ngo bo nyid ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:101b-18: las dang 'jug pa'i stobs dang ldan pa mo shr'i siddhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101b-19: dran nas brjed pa'i mtshams de na //
T02TD2453E:101b-20: blo dang bral ba'i ye shes gnas //
T02TD2453E:101b-21: rkyen bral dbus na rab tu 'ging [?] //
T02TD2453E:101b-22: de mthong na ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:101b-24: bden 'dzin mi brten ma dbang na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101b-25: yul snang dkar dmar sna tshogs la /
T02TD2453E:101b-26: rkyen gyis snang ba'i dus nyid du //
T02TD2453E:101b-27: skye ba med dang bral ba yin //
T02TD2453E:101b-28: bden pa zad pa mig gis stong //
T02TD2453E:101b-30: ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa dha ri su kha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101b-31: dngos po gcig la tha dad du //
T02TD2453E:101b-32: snang ba'i nad kas dngos po'i chos //
T02TD2453E:101b-33: sems las phyis gyur pha rol na //
T02TD2453E:101b-34: don de yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD2453E:101b-36: blo'i mtha' grol bar ta na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101b-37: ma skyes dngos gzhi rtsa ba bral //
T02TD2453E:101b-38: gzhi med blo 'das de kho na //
T02TD2453E:101b-39: dran med dbyings na gnas pa ni //
T02TD2453E:101b-40: dangs ma rkyen gyis bslad mi bya //
T02TD2453E:101b-42: nyon mongs pa mi sdud par byed pa'i stobs dang ldan pa mo ta di la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101b-43: tshogs drug ji ltar shar gyur kyang //
T02TD2453E:101b-44: bden 'dzin bcad pas bag mi chags //
T02TD2453E:101b-45: 'khrul pa'i rgyu grol las mi sog /'khor ba rang sar grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:101b-47: dpa' bo rdo rje aa ka ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:101b-48: 'khor bar skye ba'i rgyu de las //
T02TD2453E:101b-49: de ni nyon mongs pas bskyed de //
T02TD2453E:101b-50: nyon mongs yid yin gzhi rtsa bral //
T02TD2453E:101b-51: de mthong srid pa'i 'khor lo 'jig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:102a-0: @102a * // rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od dang ldan pa mo shr'i pa ra na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102a-1: skye med ngang la sna tshogs shar //
T02TD2453E:102a-2: shar pa de nyid skye med las //
T02TD2453E:102a-4: dbyer med rtogs na phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:102a-6: snang ba'i rang mtshan gzigs pa la lanta li zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102a-7: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa ste //
T02TD2453E:102a-8: rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams la //
T02TD2453E:102a-10: rmi lam du yang ma mthong ngo //
T02TD2453E:102a-12: mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa mo ta pa sa ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102a-13: ma dang srid mo bu mo yi //
T02TD2453E:102a-14: tha dad sgo nas bos pa'i ming //
T02TD2453E:102a-15: 'gro ba bzang mo'i ngo bo las //
T02TD2453E:102a-16: ma gyur pa ni ngo mtshar yul //
T02TD2453E:102a-18: rtsol ba dang bral ba sa mu dra'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2453E:102a-19: mthun 'jug bkrol ba'i rjes de la //
T02TD2453E:102a-20: snang ba rtsa brel mtshan ma grol //
T02TD2453E:102a-21: 'dzin med rang gi blo rten zhig / ma byas shes pa de ltos shig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:102a-22: bdud dang gzhan smra bar byed pas mi tshugs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa mo bi ma si ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102a-23: 'jig rten sna tshogs las las byung //
T02TD2453E:102a-24: sna tshogs rang gi ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:102a-25: rgya mtsho nang gi gza' skar bzhin //
T02TD2453E:102a-28: chos rnams rang bzhin med par shes pa bya tri pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102a-29: nyams su myong bas ngos gzung bral //
T02TD2453E:102a-30: sems nyid rtsa bral der ngos zin //
T02TD2453E:102a-31: sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin med //
T02TD2453E:102a-32: chos rnams gzhi med der ngos zin //
T02TD2453E:102a-34: rnam par rtog pa 'bigs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa mo ratna siddhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102a-35: gzugs ni dri za'i grong khyer 'dra //
T02TD2453E:102a-36: sgra rnams brag ca'i rnam pa can //
T02TD2453E:102a-37: yid ni rmi lam 'phar ma bzhin //
T02TD2453E:102a-38: rang bzhin gang yang ma mthong ngo //
T02TD2453E:102a-40: thabs las mi 'da' ba'i ye shes can dzny'a na ka ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102a-41: dmigs pas bzung ba yid kyi las //
T02TD2453E:102a-42: bshig pas dangs ma gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:102a-43: dper na 'phrul gyi me long bzhin //
T02TD2453E:102a-44: blo 'dzin dri ma bsten mi bya //
T02TD2453E:102b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin gyis @102b goms pa'i rnal 'byor ma de ba sa ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102b-1: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni //
T02TD2453E:102b-2: gang gi rgyud la skyes pa'i tshe //
T02TD2453E:102b-3: nyams su myong ba brjod mi nus //
T02TD2453E:102b-4: brda yis mtshon pa thabs kyi gnad //
T02TD2453E:102b-6: ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin ma si ra nu sa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102b-7: rig pa bsgrims nas klong pa yi //
T02TD2453E:102b-8: dang der phra rags rtog pa yal //
T02TD2453E:102b-9: spu ris med pa dran med dbyings //
T02TD2453E:102b-10: dri med ye shes 'bar ba'i sa //
T02TD2453E:102b-12: dpal gyi mdzod 'dzin ma ra si ni'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102b-13: gnyug ma rgyud la skyes pa yi //
T02TD2453E:102b-15: chos rnams ngo bos dben pa yis //
T02TD2453E:102b-16: gshis de blo yi yul ma yin //
T02TD2453E:102b-18: de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las gnyug ma rang gi ngo bo gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
T02TD2453E:102b-20: // /'jig rten gyi bya ba btang zhing rgyal rigs dman pa'i sa bzung ba d'a ri ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102b-22: de ni mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2453E:102b-23: blo ldan dpa' bos 'dus byas dang //
T02TD2453E:102b-24: 'dus ma byas kyi gnad la blta //
T02TD2453E:102b-26: thugs rje'i dpal ldan li ta pu ki'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102b-27: kye ma mtshan ma'i 'du shes ni //
T02TD2453E:102b-28: bshig nas mtshan med la gnas na //
T02TD2453E:102b-29: de yis chos rnams ma lus pa //
T02TD2453E:102b-30: stong pa rab tu shes par 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:102b-32: 'jig rten gyi bya ba gnas su btang ba au na la na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102b-33: gdod nas ma skyes rang gi sems //
T02TD2453E:102b-34: 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin can //
T02TD2453E:102b-35: kye ma don dam byang chub sems //
T02TD2453E:102b-36: nam mkha' dang mtshungs 'dus ma byas //
T02TD2453E:102b-38: bde ba'i 'byung gnas ma shr'i la li ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102b-39: sgyu ma'i rta dang glang po ltar //
T02TD2453E:102b-40: snang ba'i dus na ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:102b-41: kye ma rnam rtog gis brtags pa'i //
T02TD2453E:102b-42: zhen yul de nyid gzhi yis stong //
T02TD2453E:102b-44: sgrol ma'i byin rlabs zhugs pa kampa la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:102b-45: dang po shes bya rnam rtog tu //
T02TD2453E:102b-47: ngo bo gzhi med rtsa ba bral //
T02TD2453E:102b-48: 'di la rang bzhin yod ma yin //
T02TD2453E:103a-0: dad pa'i stobs ma su ka ratna'i @103a * //
T02TD2453E:103a-2: chu shing gi ni snying po bzhin //
T02TD2453E:103a-3: chos rnams snying po med pa can //
T02TD2453E:103a-4: bdag med rtogs pa don gyi mchog / de mthong srid pa hru la por byed //
T02TD2453E:103a-6: brdal shes rab kyi mig phye ba ka na ye na pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103a-7: kye ma rang bzhin ma bcos pa'i //
T02TD2453E:103a-8: shes pa rang rkya mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2453E:103a-9: ma byas shes pa so ma ni //
T02TD2453E:103a-10: gnyen po ma bral lhug par gnas //
T02TD2453E:103a-12: rgya mtsho'i mdangs len ma dzny'a na siddhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103a-13: shes pa rten med bdag po bral //
T02TD2453E:103a-14: gcer bu blo yis ma gos pa //
T02TD2453E:103a-15: shes pa rang kha skye 'gag grol //
T02TD2453E:103a-16: rtog pas ma gos dri ma med //
T02TD2453E:103a-18: rtog pa phyag rgya ma la shar pa aa nanta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103a-19: chos rnams rang bzhin dngos med la //
T02TD2453E:103a-20: don de byis pas mi shes pas //
T02TD2453E:103a-21: rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i bdag / bla ma'i gsung las nges mthong 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:103a-23: dpal gyi 'od zer dzambha la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103a-24: skye med mtshan ma'i dngos po yis //
T02TD2453E:103a-26: phyi dang nang gi skye mched la //
T02TD2453E:103a-27: kun du spyod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2453E:103a-29: dbang la rtog pa shar pa au ti ku pa ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103a-30: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
T02TD2453E:103a-31: 'du byed rnam par shes pa ni //
T02TD2453E:103a-32: rang gi ngo bos rnam par dben //
T02TD2453E:103a-33: gzhi med rtsa bral de ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:103a-34: bden pa rang 'dzin gzhi la 'jig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:103a-35: shes rab 'byung gnas ma shr'i du ka ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103a-36: glo bur rkyen las skyes pa yi //
T02TD2453E:103a-37: dran rig rtog pa bden pa stong //
T02TD2453E:103a-41: bdag med mas byin gyis brlabs pa sa ga la ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103a-42: dpal ldan thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD2453E:103a-43: ye shes me long de ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:103a-45: chos rnams stong par gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:103a-47: bde ba'i stobs dang ldan ma singga sing nga'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103a-48: kye ma yongs su skyo ba'i yid //
T02TD2453E:103a-49: ma skyes bla med mchog gi lam //
T02TD2453E:103a-50: rnyed par gyur pa ma yin pas //
T02TD2453E:103a-51: 'khor ba las ni yid dpyang bya //
T02TD2453E:103b-1: khar sa p'a ni la bskor ba byas pas dbugs phyin pa na ri pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103b-2: bla ma'i brda las nges rnyed pas //
T02TD2453E:103b-3: des ni chos rnams stong par rig / byis pas med pa'i chos la rtog / des ni las las grol mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:103b-5: 'gro ba'i dug sel ma dharma lang ge'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103b-6: dngos po yi ni mtshang rig pas //
T02TD2453E:103b-7: dngos med yongs su shes par 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:103b-8: chos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD2453E:103b-11: 'od gsal nang phrad pa tsanti ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103b-13: bsam med sgom dang bral ba ni //
T02TD2453E:103b-14: gnyug ma srangs su chud pa las //
T02TD2453E:103b-17: nor bu'i spyan ldan ma bha ra aa ra li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103b-18: sna rtser yid bcings gnad kyi gsang //
T02TD2453E:103b-19: ma yengs mi rtog skye ba'i sa //
T02TD2453E:103b-20: ka ra na yis bde rlung bzung //
T02TD2453E:103b-21: bde chen thig le gnas par byed //
T02TD2453E:103b-23: zag med bde ba la rgyal ba shr'i kshu ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103b-24: bskal pa gangg'a'i bye snyed du //
T02TD2453E:103b-25: gser gyi rgyal ba'i mchod pa gus //
T02TD2453E:103b-26: bla ma'i ba spu khung gcig la //
T02TD2453E:103b-27: sku ma nyed song la khyad par 'phags //
T02TD2453E:103b-29: thugs rje'i 'od zer can su ka dha na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103b-30: bsod nams til dang ri rab khyad //
T02TD2453E:103b-31: su zhig thar pa'i grong mchog 'dod //
T02TD2453E:103b-32: bla ma gtsug tu bkur bar bya //
T02TD2453E:103b-33: 'di brjed mchog gi dngos grub yal //
T02TD2453E:103b-35: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa'i aa li pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103b-36: snang ba gzugs kyi ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:103b-37: chos rnams sgyu mar blo thag bcad //
T02TD2453E:103b-38: bden 'dzin rgyud la brten mi bya //
T02TD2453E:103b-39: grub mtha'i lta ba 'dod pa spang //
T02TD2453E:103b-41: brtson 'grus kyi stobs ldan ma ri dha ru'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103b-42: gang la mngon par zhen pa yi //
T02TD2453E:103b-43: blo de thong cig bdud yin no //
T02TD2453E:103b-44: gnyis snang shes pa grol gyur na //
T02TD2453E:103b-45: 'khrul pa chos nyid dang du dangs //
T02TD2453E:103b-47: brda las don mthong bas 'khrul pa'i sgrog bcad pa su ta la li pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:103b-48: nyon mongs gnyen por ma song ba'i //
T02TD2453E:103b-49: chos kyis sangs lam rnyed ma yin //
T02TD2453E:103b-50: kye ma rgyud dang ma 'brel pa'i //
T02TD2453E:104a-1: bsgom ming yin ci phyir rung //
T02TD2453E:104a-3: bsod nams kyi rgyan ldan su ri ka ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104a-4: ma bcos rnal ma'i thig le ni //
T02TD2453E:104a-5: snying la brten nas 'khrul pa 'jig / shes pa rkyen gyis mi bslad do //
T02TD2453E:104a-6: yul gyi rjes su 'brangs gyur na //
T02TD2453E:104a-7: khro bo'i rig pa rten par byed //
T02TD2453E:104a-9: dur khrod kyi keng rus mthong ba la rtog pa shar ba kumpa ri pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104a-10: ji ltar lha dbang brgya byin gyi //
T02TD2453E:104a-11: ming de gang la 'ongs btsal kyang //
T02TD2453E:104a-12: phyogs rnams kun nas mi rnyed ltar //
T02TD2453E:104a-13: lus la bdag kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2453E:104a-15: zab mo dpal gyi 'od ldan ma'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104a-16: rmi lam du yang yod pa ru //
T02TD2453E:104a-17: ma mthong btsal bas ma rnyed pa //
T02TD2453E:104a-18: byang chub lam yin brtag par rigs //
T02TD2453E:104a-19: bdag med sgom dang rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2453E:104a-21: sems la dbang thob pa kha dha ga ga ti pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104a-22: 'od gsal dngos med ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:104a-23: chos dbyings ye shes de ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:104a-24: stong nyid rig pa'i rang bzhin du //
T02TD2453E:104a-25: 'dug pa nus pa'i rtsal yin te //
T02TD2453E:104a-26: me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02TD2453E:104a-28: thar pa'i lam ston ma dzny'a na badzra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104a-29: me long lta bu'i ye shes zung //
T02TD2453E:104a-30: rig dang stong pa gnyis med las //
T02TD2453E:104a-31: ma 'das pa nyid ye shes yin //
T02TD2453E:104a-32: gsal ba so sor rtog pa la //
T02TD2453E:104a-33: rtsal ni bya ba grub pa'o //
T02TD2453E:104a-35: rtsa rlung las su rung ba dben pa ai la pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104a-36: chos rnams rang bzhin ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:104a-37: gang gis rmi lam lta bur shes //
T02TD2453E:104a-38: de la 'ching ba mtha' dag bral //
T02TD2453E:104a-39: skye dang 'chi ba mi mthong ngo //
T02TD2453E:104a-41: rtog pa'i dpal dang ldan pa ma ba su dha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104a-42: stong pa dag kyang ma mthong ba'i //
T02TD2453E:104a-43: mig des dngos po'i gnas thabs mthong //
T02TD2453E:104a-44: 'khrul snang dag pa'i dus der ni //
T02TD2453E:104a-47: gnas ngan len dang bral ba ke du aa la pa'i zhal nas /
T02TD2453E:104a-48: ji ltar ded dpon rgya mtsho las //
T02TD2453E:104a-49: ma phyin gling don mi 'grub ltar //
T02TD2453E:104a-50: 'khor ba'i blo sna ma log par //
T02TD2453E:104a-51: thar pa'i lam rnyed ma yin no //
T02TD2453E:104b-0: @104b legs pa'i 'byung gnas ma su kha ku le'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104b-1: byis pa tshe 'di mig bltas nas //
T02TD2453E:104b-2: 'jig rten che thabs bsgrub pa ni //
T02TD2453E:104b-3: phyi ma rnam smin sog pa'i rgyu //
T02TD2453E:104b-4: rang mgo rang gis 'tshogs par bas //
T02TD2453E:104b-6: rtog pa khyad par 'phags pa ga na pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104b-7: chos rnams dngos po med pa yi //
T02TD2453E:104b-8: ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes ni //
T02TD2453E:104b-9: gdod ma nas ni rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2453E:104b-10: rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD2453E:104b-12: dpa' mo blo gros bzang mo bha ga dha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104b-13: ma skyes mi 'gag yi ge med //
T02TD2453E:104b-14: mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2453E:104b-15: rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs pa //
T02TD2453E:104b-16: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub mthong //
T02TD2453E:104b-18: bsags sbyangs sngon du song ba'i rten las 'phro can tsa dur ki pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104b-19: snang stong skye ba med pa yis //
T02TD2453E:104b-20: rkyen dang bral ba'i shes pa ni //
T02TD2453E:104b-21: blos ma byas kyi rang kha ste //
T02TD2453E:104b-22: ma bcos rnal ma spros dang bral //
T02TD2453E:104b-24: padma 'od ldan ma su dha ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104b-25: 'di la rtag dang chang la sogs //
T02TD2453E:104b-26: grub mtha'i lta bas reg mi nus //
T02TD2453E:104b-27: blo 'das smra bsam yul ma yin //
T02TD2453E:104b-28: yi ges stong bas ming las grol //
T02TD2453E:104b-30: mthong lam ye shes rgyud la shar ba'i man pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104b-31: chos rnams dngos po med pa las //
T02TD2453E:104b-32: byung ba ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
T02TD2453E:104b-33: ltos dang skal ldan rigs kyi bu //
T02TD2453E:104b-34: mthong na mchog gi skal bar ldan //
T02TD2453E:104b-36: bde ba'i 'dod 'dzom shr'i sa ba ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104b-37: nges par yang dag brtan gyur pa //
T02TD2453E:104b-38: 'di ni lam gyi dam pa ste //
T02TD2453E:104b-39: spangs pa mthar thug sangs rgyas kyi //
T02TD2453E:104b-40: ye shes bla med yongs rdzogs byed //
T02TD2453E:104b-42: ma dad pa'i snang ba sgyur nus pa ka na ku na pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104b-43: skye bo 'khrul pa'i ngo gang la //
T02TD2453E:104b-44: 'khor ba rang rgyud pa ru snang //
T02TD2453E:104b-45: de ni 'phags pa'i snang ba la //
T02TD2453E:104b-46: sgyu ma tsam du rab tu gzigs //
T02TD2453E:104b-48: bzang mo dge ba'i 'od ldan ma su kha dha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:104b-49: rnal 'byor pa yi snang ba la //
T02TD2453E:104b-50: bden brdzun gnyis snang grol ba yis //
T02TD2453E:105a-2: gzod nas zhi zhing dag pa'i dbyings //
T02TD2453E:105a-4: gnyid kyi sgrib pa dag pa aang tsing pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105a-5: mkha' la zla ba chu nang du //
T02TD2453E:105a-6: nam du yang ni 'phos pa med //
T02TD2453E:105a-7: chu zla rang gi ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:105a-10: rig pa'i rgyal mo aa su dha la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105a-11: yod pa dang ni med pa yi //
T02TD2453E:105a-12: blo 'dzin de ni dri ma ste //
T02TD2453E:105a-13: rnal 'byor mtha' gnyis rnam spangs la //
T02TD2453E:105a-14: dbus la gnas par mi bya'o //
T02TD2453E:105a-16: de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las snying gi me long rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o /
T02TD2453E:105a-18: // / drod kyi ye shes thob pa bo dhi pi pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105a-19: skye bo 'khrul pa ma khegs pas //
T02TD2453E:105a-21: sems byung de yi khams kyis ni //
T02TD2453E:105a-22: mtshan nyid gzung bas log rtog khegs //
T02TD2453E:105a-24: shes rab kyi stobs ldan ma dhi ri dha la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105a-25: rtog pas gzung bas skye mched kyi /
T02TD2453E:105a-26: sgo dbye dbang po rnam lnga shar //
T02TD2453E:105a-27: de yis yul la zhugs gyur pas //
T02TD2453E:105a-28: dug lnga skyes nas las bsags pas //
T02TD2453E:105a-29: srid pa'i 'khor lo grub par byas //
T02TD2453E:105a-31: 'jigs pa lnga dang bral ba seng ge ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105a-32: ji ltar mun pa'i rgya rum ni //
T02TD2453E:105a-33: snang byed nyi mas bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2453E:105a-34: spros med lhan cig skyes pa yis //
T02TD2453E:105a-35: dang der chos rnams dag par 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:105a-37: byin rlabs kyi dpal ldan ma su ka ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105a-38: chu 'dzin dag ni nam mkha' la //
T02TD2453E:105a-39: dangs tshe gud na yib min ltar //
T02TD2453E:105a-40: mtshan ma rang sar grol ba yi //
T02TD2453E:105a-41: dbyings na 'khor ba yod ma yin //
T02TD2453E:105a-43: gnyis 'dzin mdud pa khrol ba ki la la ki'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105a-45: bdag 'dzin nyon mongs zhing yin te //
T02TD2453E:105a-46: bdag 'dzin las kyi sa bon no //
T02TD2453E:105a-49: dpa' mo shes rab bzang mo dzny'a na li ta ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105a-50: bdag 'dzin rtog pa'i gzhi yin te /
T02TD2453E:105b-0: bdag 'dzin rnam @105b rtog ma mo yin //
T02TD2453E:105b-1: bdag 'dzin bag chags snod yin phyir //
T02TD2453E:105b-2: ma spangs mya ngan 'das mi thob //
T02TD2453E:105b-4: 'khor ba'i bde ba la snying rje'i gnas su gzigs pa tsandha li pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105b-5: 'di ltar chos rnams thams cad kyi //
T02TD2453E:105b-6: rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin te //
T02TD2453E:105b-7: sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya //
T02TD2453E:105b-8: rmi lam smig rgyu brag ca dngos //
T02TD2453E:105b-10: gyad kyi stobs ldan ma dha ra ma h'a'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105b-11: mi g-yor sprul pa chu zla dang //
T02TD2453E:105b-12: chos rnams gzugs brnyan las ma 'das //
T02TD2453E:105b-13: nam mkha' lta bur shes gyur na //
T02TD2453E:105b-14: dus gsum mi dmigs spros bral 'char //
T02TD2453E:105b-16: mkha' 'gro'i byin rlabs zhugs pa dza la si pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105b-17: 'dzin bral rig pa nyams las grol //
T02TD2453E:105b-18: phyag rgya chen po blo bral la //
T02TD2453E:105b-19: brtags na 'khrul la bsams na ldang //
T02TD2453E:105b-20: bsgoms na 'tshal la btsal na 'jig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:105b-21: bkra shis dpal 'dzin ma bi ma la siddhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105b-22: dpyad na stong la rig pa 'gag / snang dang stong pa'i rkyen dang bral //
T02TD2453E:105b-23: brjod du med pa'i tshig tu brjod //
T02TD2453E:105b-24: chos rnams ming med yi ge bral //
T02TD2453E:105b-25: tshig gi lam las 'das pa can //
T02TD2453E:105b-27: nor bu'i 'od ldan ma su kha dha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105b-28: mtshan ma rang zhi skye 'gag brla //
T02TD2453E:105b-29: mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD2453E:105b-30: bsam yid bral ba de ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:105b-31: 'di ni ngo mtshar gzigs mor che //
T02TD2453E:105b-33: rtogs pa'i mthar phyin karma badzra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105b-34: blos byas bsam gtan gzugs brnyan te //
T02TD2453E:105b-36: bsgoms na yod la ma bsgoms med //
T02TD2453E:105b-37: de ni rkyen la rag lus so //
T02TD2453E:105b-39: padma'i mdangs ldan ma bha su ka ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105b-40: don gyi lhan cig skyes pa yi //
T02TD2453E:105b-41: phyogs su gang zhen nye mi nus //
T02TD2453E:105b-42: rang bzhin gnyug ma'i bsam gtan ni //
T02TD2453E:105b-43: rang la babs pas rgyun mi 'chad //
T02TD2453E:105b-45: gnyis snang gi dri ma dag pa padma badzra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:105b-46: 'khor ba thog ma med pa ru //
T02TD2453E:105b-47: yang nas yang du 'khyam pa'i rgyu //
T02TD2453E:105b-48: byis pas rtog pa don du bzung //
T02TD2453E:105b-49: des ni srid pa dra ba btags /
T02TD2453E:106a-1: bde ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa mo dzny'a na sa ga'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106a-2: chos rnams rang bzhin spros dang bral //
T02TD2453E:106a-3: gang yang yod pa ma yin te //
T02TD2453E:106a-4: smig rgyu chu yis dben pa bzhin //
T02TD2453E:106a-5: chos rnams der shes grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:106a-7: yi ge bdun pas nyon mongs kyi dug thon pa aa nanta badzra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106a-8: rlung sems 'od gsal la bcings pas //
T02TD2453E:106a-9: gnyug ma srangs su chud par byed //
T02TD2453E:106a-10: rig pa yul gyi rjes mi 'brang //
T02TD2453E:106a-11: phyi rol chags zhen bzlog par 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:106a-13: bzang mo dad pa'i stobs can ma su ni bi ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106a-14: rig pa byi 'phur dum bu'i gnad //
T02TD2453E:106a-16: mi rtog ltengs ka bslang nas ni //
T02TD2453E:106a-17: tha mal mngon zhen ldog par byed //
T02TD2453E:106a-19: bla ma'i brda las don gyi rang ngo shes pa ba su dha ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106a-20: kye ma mthong bar dka' ba'i chos //
T02TD2453E:106a-21: phra zhing zhi ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD2453E:106a-22: chos rnams dmigs su med pa la //
T02TD2453E:106a-23: yi ger 'jug pa nus ma yin //
T02TD2453E:106a-25: rdzu 'phrul dpal ldan ma su ka ra ki'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106a-26: yid la byed pa dang bral ba //
T02TD2453E:106a-28: bdag ces bya ba gang yang btsal //
T02TD2453E:106a-29: ngo bo stong pas mi rnyed do //
T02TD2453E:106a-31: rtog pa rkyen thog tu khel ba pra dzny'a pha la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106a-32: dngos 'dzin grol na bde ba che //
T02TD2453E:106a-33: thabs kyis mchog tu gyur pa'i sman //
T02TD2453E:106a-35: 'di las lhag pa'i sems yod min //
T02TD2453E:106a-37: ye shes kyi 'byung gnas ma shr'i aa li ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106a-38: ji sred gces 'dzin ma zhig par //
T02TD2453E:106a-39: 'ching ba'i rgyu dang bral ba min //
T02TD2453E:106a-40: bdag tu 'dzin pa grol ba dang //
T02TD2453E:106a-43: 'bras bu rang chas su gzigs pa tsarya ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106a-44: skye ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa //
T02TD2453E:106a-46: rtog med spros bral yang dag mtha' //
T02TD2453E:106a-47: 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub //
T02TD2453E:106a-49: tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang ldan ma sing gha dha li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106b-0: tshig gis gtan la @106b mi phebs te //
T02TD2453E:106b-1: bla ma'i brda las nges mthong bya //
T02TD2453E:106b-2: nyams su myong ba ngos gzung bral //
T02TD2453E:106b-5: rtsa ba'i don dbang bzhi las rnyed pa aa ba dh'u t'i pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106b-6: mi mthun lam du ba slang pa yis //
T02TD2453E:106b-8: 'dis ni sna tshogs lam du slongs //
T02TD2453E:106b-9: bgags sol snang ba rang sar grol //
T02TD2453E:106b-11: zla ba'i 'od zer ma gha ma li ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106b-12: nam mkha' mdung tshugs bsam gtan mkhar //
T02TD2453E:106b-13: rig pa sor bzhag gnad kyi mtshang //
T02TD2453E:106b-14: bde gsal rgyun mi 'chad par byed //
T02TD2453E:106b-15: yul la yengs par mi bya'o //
T02TD2453E:106b-17: rten 'brel gyi 'gros la byang ba krishna pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106b-18: kye ma ngo bo nyid kyis zla ba //
T02TD2453E:106b-19: gzugs kyi rang bzhin de ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:106b-20: stong pa'i tshan nyid gsal 'gyur gyis //
T02TD2453E:106b-21: gzugs kyi mtshar mthong de nyid shes //
T02TD2453E:106b-23: lha'i rgyan ldan par ba ki ri'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2453E:106b-24: de rig mya ngan 'das rtogs byed //
T02TD2453E:106b-25: dngos po med la dngos po ru //
T02TD2453E:106b-26: 'dzin pa'i dmigs pa can rnams la //
T02TD2453E:106b-27: thar pa nam yang yod ma yin //
T02TD2453E:106b-29: spros bral gyi ye shes ngos zin pa ko sha pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106b-30: chos rnams thams cad ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:106b-31: bden zad brdzun zad yi ge zad //
T02TD2453E:106b-32: don zad nam mkha'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD2453E:106b-33: bsam du ma btub bsgoms las grol //
T02TD2453E:106b-35: dpal gyi 'od 'dzin ma ratna li ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106b-36: rtog bral yul gyi rjes mi 'brang //
T02TD2453E:106b-37: snang ba had pos der 'dzin grol //
T02TD2453E:106b-38: sor bzhag tshogs drug lhug pa'i ngang //
T02TD2453E:106b-39: bsgom blo 'dun pa dri ma yin //
T02TD2453E:106b-41: mos gus kyis rgyud smin pa a'arya singga'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:106b-42: chos rnams ma lus rnam kun ni //
T02TD2453E:106b-43: rjod byed tshig dang brjod bya'i don //
T02TD2453E:106b-44: rnam pa gnyis kyis stong 'gyur bas //
T02TD2453E:106b-45: gzhi rtsa med pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD2453E:106b-47: bzod pa'i stobs ldan ma na ta ra'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2453E:106b-48: tshogs drug yul gyi snang ba ni //
T02TD2453E:106b-49: sna tshogs rkyen gyi snang ba ste //
T02TD2453E:106b-50: rkyen snang sgyu ma las ma 'das //
T02TD2453E:107a-0: rang bzhin med de ngo mtshar @107a * //
T02TD2453E:107a-3: dngos rnams bden med du gzigs pa ratna badzra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107a-5: ma grol mya ngan las mi 'da' //
T02TD2453E:107a-6: gang gi mthar thug ngos zin pa'i //
T02TD2453E:107a-7: blo de nyid ni rnam rtog go //
T02TD2453E:107a-9: dpal gyi 'od zer shriddh'a na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107a-10: mchog tu 'dzin pa'i dri ma de //
T02TD2453E:107a-11: lam gyi bdud du shes par bya //
T02TD2453E:107a-12: re ba med pa'i snying dkyil na //
T02TD2453E:107a-13: bla med nor bu rin chen gnas //
T02TD2453E:107a-15: gnyen po'i 'phrang chod pa dza ra na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107a-16: dpa' bo blo gros ldan pa yis //
T02TD2453E:107a-17: chos kyi rang bzhin zhi ba ru //
T02TD2453E:107a-18: shes tshe ring du mi thogs par //
T02TD2453E:107a-21: bde ba'i mdangs ldan ma shr'i ka su ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107a-23: thug pa'i gsung gi sde snod rnams //
T02TD2453E:107a-24: rnam grangs tha dad don gcig par //
T02TD2453E:107a-25: bla ma'i brda las rab tu blang //
T02TD2453E:107a-27: go yul rjes la 'khyil ba ra tri ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107a-28: yid la ma byas dangs ma'i dang //
T02TD2453E:107a-29: gang yang ma skyes gnyug ma'i gshis //
T02TD2453E:107a-30: ma bcos rnal ma chos kyi sku //
T02TD2453E:107a-31: bdag med gnyis sdus chos kyis stong //
T02TD2453E:107a-33: / byin rlabs kyi 'byung gnas ma su ri su ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107a-35: chos rnams bden pa zad pa ru //
T02TD2453E:107a-36: mthong pa'i dus bden pa grol //
T02TD2453E:107a-37: des ni srid pa rkul por byed //
T02TD2453E:107a-39: re dgos shigs pa tsandra go mi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107a-40: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa ste //
T02TD2453E:107a-41: chu shing bzhin du snying po med //
T02TD2453E:107a-42: khams rnams rang gi ngo bos dben //
T02TD2453E:107a-43: chu yi sbu ba lta bu'o //
T02TD2453E:107a-45: bde ba'i stobs ldan ma bha ta ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107a-46: smig rgyu bzhin du skye mched rnams //
T02TD2453E:107a-47: rang bzhin ma grub ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:107a-48: snang pa rang sar grol ba'i mtshang //
T02TD2453E:107a-49: de nyid ltos dang rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2453E:107a-51: 'bras bu la bsgrub blo bral ba aa sho ka ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107a-52: rtog pa btsal pas mi rtog pa //
T02TD2453E:107a-53: nam du yang ni mi rnyed de //
T02TD2453E:107a-54: tshol ba'i dus nyid rtog pa las //
T02TD2453E:107b-0: ma 'das dran @107b pa'i spu ris so //
T02TD2453E:107b-2: dpal gyi 'od ldan ma su ka to'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107b-3: kye ma rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2453E:107b-4: rang bzhin ngo bos stong gyur pa //
T02TD2453E:107b-5: de tshe rtog pa ma spangs par //
T02TD2453E:107b-6: de tshe rtog pa ma spangs par //
T02TD2453E:107b-7: rang bzhin gyis ni gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:107b-9: shr'i tsandra pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107b-10: mi rtog 'dod pa'i blo de nyid //
T02TD2453E:107b-11: ngo bo rtog pa'i bdag nyid de //
T02TD2453E:107b-12: rtog dang mi rtog gnyis med pa //
T02TD2453E:107b-13: de ni rtsa ba'i don yin no //
T02TD2453E:107b-15: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba grub pa thob pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur las dpal gyi 'od zer rnam par shar ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o /
T02TD2453E:107b-17: // / nyams myong tshogs drug gis bskor ba bhu ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107b-18: phyag rgya che la bsgom du med //
T02TD2453E:107b-19: blo yis 'dun ba mi rten te //
T02TD2453E:107b-20: bsgom pa bdag po la gtod cig //
T02TD2453E:107b-22: bde ba'i 'od zer can singa li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107b-23: mi bsgom shes pa de ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:107b-25: ma byas pa yi shes pa ni //
T02TD2453E:107b-26: ngo mtshar ltang mo'i yul yin no //
T02TD2453E:107b-28: rig pa dangs pa la rten 'brel gyi gnas gzigs pa dzee ta ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107b-29: ji ltar rgyal po rigs ngan gyi //
T02TD2453E:107b-30: spyod pa byas na gya ba bzhin //
T02TD2453E:107b-31: sgrub pa po ni don med pa'i //
T02TD2453E:107b-32: spyod pa gzhi dang bcas la spang //
T02TD2453E:107b-34: rtog pa'i 'byung gnas ma ma dha ro ha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107b-35: zil dang ra bcud len sman gyi mchog / skyugs na nad du 'gyur pa bzhin //
T02TD2453E:107b-36: sgom nyams mu cor smras pa na //
T02TD2453E:107b-37: yongs su yal bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2453E:107b-39: byings rmugs rno ngar gyis bsal ba bhi ta ka ma'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107b-40: snang ba stong pa'i ngo bo ru //
T02TD2453E:107b-41: grol bar mthong pa'i mig de ni //
T02TD2453E:107b-42: dri ma med pa'i ngo bo'i rtsal //
T02TD2453E:107b-43: de ni rtogs pa'i gdeng yin no //
T02TD2453E:107b-45: dbang phyug gi stobs dang ldan ma bu ga dha la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:107b-46: stong pa'i rang bzhin 'gag med du //
T02TD2453E:107b-48: blo ldan de ni skal ba bzang //
T02TD2453E:107b-49: las grol med na thar bar byed //
T02TD2453E:107b-51: stong nyid rang gi ngo bo rjes la zin par tan dza la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108a-2: shes pa skad cig dang po la //
T02TD2453E:108a-3: yul dang sgong phrad pa bzhin //
T02TD2453E:108a-4: de nyid brtags pas rang bzhin med //
T02TD2453E:108a-6: bde ba'i mdangs ldan ma aa dzu li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108a-7: stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 'dzin //
T02TD2453E:108a-8: rig pa spros bral 'dus byas min //
T02TD2453E:108a-9: rtog med sems kyi ngo bo la //
T02TD2453E:108a-12: lta ba ming las grol bas grub mtha'i 'dod pa zhig pa bha dra pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108a-13: sna rtser yid bcings 'gyu ba dang //
T02TD2453E:108a-14: yul snang ma mthong der 'dzin bral //
T02TD2453E:108a-15: dus gsum yid la ma byas pa'i //
T02TD2453E:108a-16: de tshe dran ba'i rim mo 'jig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:108a-17: bde ba'i mdangs ldan ma si ridhi na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108a-18: shes pa mdung tshugs spros pa zhi //
T02TD2453E:108a-20: 'di ltar dbang po rang sna gi / yul na bsam med bsgom dang bral //
T02TD2453E:108a-22: rlung sems lta stangs kyis 'ching ba kun du ru'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108a-23: thar lam dgra med mi 'ong bas //
T02TD2453E:108a-24: sgrub pa rkyen khar gtang mi bya //
T02TD2453E:108a-25: las mtha' ma log rab tu gces //
T02TD2453E:108a-26: grogs ni chags sdang skye ba'i rgyu //
T02TD2453E:108a-28: thugs rje dpal gyi sgron ma su ka pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108a-29: ri dags smas ma ji bzhin du //
T02TD2453E:108a-30: au pa gcig pu ra gnas par bya //
T02TD2453E:108a-31: skye bo'i dbus su rtogs pa 'grib //
T02TD2453E:108a-32: mchog gi don gnyer bas mthar song //
T02TD2453E:108a-34: gnyen po stobs su gyur pas nyon mongs pa la btsan chod kyi rdzis byed pa dza mbu ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108a-35: kye ma 'jig rten che thabs ni //
T02TD2453E:108a-36: thar lam sgrub pa'i mi mthun phyogs //
T02TD2453E:108a-37: klu mchog rnams kyi mgo bo ni //
T02TD2453E:108a-38: de nyid sdug bsngal rten yin bzhin //
T02TD2453E:108a-40: stobs ldan rgyal mo s'urya kha dhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108a-41: dngos po'i zhen chags 'khor ba'i rgyu //
T02TD2453E:108a-42: zhe na med mya ngan 'das pa'i lam //
T02TD2453E:108a-44: 'dod pa dang bral bde ba'i mchog / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:108a-45: nyon mongs pa rang sar grol bas 'khrul ba'i sgrog chod pa dzi na mi tra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108b-0: phra rags chod pa seng ge'i mig /'di yi nang na mi rtog @108b pa'i //
T02TD2453E:108b-1: rang rig ye shes dri med gnas //
T02TD2453E:108b-2: mig ni zum par mi bya'o //
T02TD2453E:108b-4: byin rlabs kyi 'od zer can bha nu dh'a ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108b-5: dri med dngos 'dzin bcings pa'i gnas //
T02TD2453E:108b-7: bde chen rgyal po mchog gi lam //
T02TD2453E:108b-8: 'di ni thabs kyi rgyal mo yin //
T02TD2453E:108b-10: yul snang brda ru shar bas don gyi gnad rig pa so na shri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108b-11: nges pa'i shes pa sma skyes par //
T02TD2453E:108b-12: bden pa mthong par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD2453E:108b-13: bsnyems sel khu 'phrig dag pa'i dbyig / mchog tu gces pa'i gter yin no //
T02TD2453E:108b-15: dbyings kyi gtso mo dzny'a na ro ha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108b-17: so ma nyid bdud kyis byin rlabs so //
T02TD2453E:108b-18: the tshom gyis ni dngos grub 'dor //
T02TD2453E:108b-19: yid ches yon tan kun gyi gzhi //
T02TD2453E:108b-21: rig pa so la bzhag pas bde gsal rgyun mi 'chad pa dza ba ri ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108b-22: ka ra na bcings yon tan gyis //
T02TD2453E:108b-23: rig pa srangs su chud pa yis //
T02TD2453E:108b-24: yul gyi gsal cha ma 'gags pa //
T02TD2453E:108b-25: dar 'dzin shes pa grol bar byed //
T02TD2453E:108b-27: dpal mo padma kha dha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108b-28: des ni phra rags rtogs pa spong //
T02TD2453E:108b-29: bde rlung rig pa thog babs su //
T02TD2453E:108b-31: lta stangs so ma brje ba gces //
T02TD2453E:108b-33: spros bral ye shes tshogs bsags pa las byung ba shr'i s'a ga r'a zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108b-34: rtog pa bsal nas mi rtog pa //
T02TD2453E:108b-36: rtog ba med na ye shes la //
T02TD2453E:108b-37: skye ba'i thabs med ye shes 'gag / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:108b-38: bzang mo nor bu'i 'od ldan ma bhi ga si'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108b-39: rtog pa gang skye mi dmigs par //
T02TD2453E:108b-40: spyad pas shes rab zas su 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:108b-41: thabs des rnam par rtog pa'i rtsal //
T02TD2453E:108b-42: ye shes chen por 'char bar byed //
T02TD2453E:108b-44: ngo sprod cig car phog pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa de nyid du thob pa s'urya shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:108b-45: snying rje'i mda' med stong pa'i gzhus //
T02TD2453E:108b-46: rgyud la myong ba mi skye ste //
T02TD2453E:108b-47: thabs dang bral pa'i shes rab ni //
T02TD2453E:108b-48: go ba'i yul du ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:109a-2: dpal gyi 'byung gnas sa la dza dha ra'i zhal snga nas /
