T02TD2453E:109a-3: gzhu med snying rje'i mda' yis kyang //
T02TD2453E:109a-4: don byed nus pa ma yin te //
T02TD2453E:109a-5: shes rab dang bral thabs kyis ni //
T02TD2453E:109a-6: lag tu lon pa ma yin no //
T02TD2453E:109a-8: shes pa bden med du slong bas 'khrul pa'i rkyen las grol ba shr'i ta ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109a-9: thub pa'i spyan gyis rlung sems bcings //
T02TD2453E:109a-10: snang ba ma dmigs der 'dzin grol //
T02TD2453E:109a-11: de tshe shes pa yul mi phrogs //
T02TD2453E:109a-14: bde chen rgyal mo su la kha dha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109a-15: mi g-yo rtse gcig dang ba'i ngang //
T02TD2453E:109a-16: rtog pa rang grol chos sku //
T02TD2453E:109a-17: rig pa gcer bu sgrib g-yogs bral //
T02TD2453E:109a-18: shes pa rang lugs phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:109a-20: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i rtsis 'bras bu la 'dod blo bral ba ghu dhe ri ba'i zhal sngas nas /
T02TD2453E:109a-21: sku bzhi thob tu mi ster ba'i //
T02TD2453E:109a-22: bgegs de 'dod pa'i blo yin no //
T02TD2453E:109a-24: zhing khams gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2453E:109a-26: dpal gyi sgron me su ka tsandha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109a-27: 'dod pa'i blo bral bde chen gyis //
T02TD2453E:109a-28: dus der sdug bsngal bral bar byed //
T02TD2453E:109a-29: 'dod pa'i blo rnams log pa yis //
T02TD2453E:109a-32: nges pa'i shes pas the tshom gyis dri ma sel ba shr'i pa ra n'a'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109a-33: kun la khyab pa chos kyi sku //
T02TD2453E:109a-35: spros dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2453E:109a-36: ye shes rang gnas rgyun chad med //
T02TD2453E:109a-38: bde ba'i ngos 'dzin ma bha nu ro ho'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109a-39: nam mkha'i dang can gdod nas dag / mtha' bzhi las ni rnam par grol //
T02TD2453E:109a-41: dus kyis ma bsdus phya rgya che //
T02TD2453E:109a-43: nyon mongs pa rang thog tu grol bas gnyen po'i bya ra zhig pa sa ra dhi ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109a-44: shes pa dar can de ltos dang //
T02TD2453E:109a-45: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02TD2453E:109a-46: rig pa dri med lam gyi mchog / thig le grol na rnam par mthong //
T02TD2453E:109a-48: bde ba'i sgron la la dha li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109b-0: sems @109b la ye shes skye 'gyur ba //
T02TD2453E:109b-1: rig pa drungs pa khro bo'i spyan //
T02TD2453E:109b-2: sor bzhag rnam rtog rlung mi bskyod //
T02TD2453E:109b-5: nyams myong snang ba las grol bas sgom thun 'jog zhig pa n'a ga badzra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109b-6: bla ma'i byin rlabs ma zhugs pa'i //
T02TD2453E:109b-7: rgyud la rtog pa 'char ba min //
T02TD2453E:109b-8: nges pa'i shes pa ma skyes par //
T02TD2453E:109b-9: de nyid zab mo'i don mi mthong //
T02TD2453E:109b-11: 'bar ba'i gtso mo aa ma ka pa la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109b-12: gnyug ma ras su ma chud pa'i //
T02TD2453E:109b-13: rten bral che ba bla ma'i brda //
T02TD2453E:109b-14: 'di la nges pa stor pa na //
T02TD2453E:109b-15: mtshon byed yi ge mang du 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:109b-17: dus gsum skye 'gag gis stong pa'i rig pas rnam rtog rang sar dangs pa padma badzra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109b-18: bden par mthong ba 'khrul pa'i blo //
T02TD2453E:109b-19: yang dag bden pa de shig cig //
T02TD2453E:109b-20: 'di yis blo mtha'i lta ba gro la //
T02TD2453E:109b-21: des ni gnyis snang mi gnas so //
T02TD2453E:109b-23: legs pa'i dpa' mo se ri te ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109b-24: rten 'brel rtsa pa phyin pa yis //
T02TD2453E:109b-25: 'khor ba'i sa bon mi gnas te //
T02TD2453E:109b-26: ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar //
T02TD2453E:109b-29: spros bral gyi don dran pas bzung bas rjes la yul rjes mi 'brel pa badzra dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109b-30: tha ma la rnam rtog nub pa yi //
T02TD2453E:109b-31: rten la thabs kyi lam mi dgos //
T02TD2453E:109b-32: 'khrul pa dag pa'i shes pa la //
T02TD2453E:109b-33: 'di la lta ba dgos pa min //
T02TD2453E:109b-35: dpal gyi rgyal mo su ka ra li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109b-36: rtog pa'i spu ris spangs pa yi //
T02TD2453E:109b-37: shes pa la ni bsgom mi dgos //
T02TD2453E:109b-38: rang snang grol bar gyur pa la //
T02TD2453E:109b-39: sgrub pa nyams su blang mi dgos //
T02TD2453E:109b-41: yul snang sgyu mar ngos zin pas shes pa la deng 'dzin zhig pa bi ma la ghi ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109b-42: tshogs drug yul la ma 'phros pa //
T02TD2453E:109b-43: dus gsum rang sar grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:109b-45: rtse gcig rten las 'da' mi bya //
T02TD2453E:109b-47: rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od zer can padma wa ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:109b-48: yengs na de nyid mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:110a-0: ma yengs pa ni thabs kyi @110a * //
T02TD2453E:110a-2: bde gsal stong pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD2453E:110a-3: 'di yis rab tu rnyed par byed //
T02TD2453E:110a-5: / brda don khong du chud pas 'khrul pa yul thog tu chod pa gir ti dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110a-6: le lo 'khrul snang grong khyer dang //
T02TD2453E:110a-7: 'dres pa 'dis ni sa ni thar ba'i lam //
T02TD2453E:110a-8: dus gsum na yang rnyed pa med //
T02TD2453E:110a-9: brtags na 'khrul pa gzhi yod min //
T02TD2453E:110a-11: dpal gyi bde ster ma sa ri dha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110a-12: 'di ni rang snang glo bur ba //
T02TD2453E:110a-13: rtsa bral rang bzhin ni med pa yi //
T02TD2453E:110a-14: mtshang de ltos dang rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD2453E:110a-17: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las mi zad pa'i rin po che'i gter mdzod rnam par rdol ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o /
T02TD2453E:110a-19: // / mi mthun pa lam du slong bas 'gal rkyen grogs su 'char ba shr'i badzra ba la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110a-20: 'khor ba pa la bde ba med //
T02TD2453E:110a-21: chug yi gnyer ma ji bzhin du //
T02TD2453E:110a-22: sdug bsngal gcig phyir gcig gis sleb//
T02TD2453E:110a-23: tshe 'di ci byas sdug bsngal rgyu //
T02TD2453E:110a-25: bde ba'i rol myos ma bhu ga la ma'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110a-26: bltar ru med pa de mthong na //
T02TD2453E:110a-27: gzur du med pa'i don zin te ;
T02TD2453E:110a-28: / de ni rtsol ba'i nad las grol //
T02TD2453E:110a-29: bde chen rgyal po thob par byed //
T02TD2453E:110a-31: rtog pa snga phyis long ma brtags pas ma bsgoms pas shes pa spros bral du gyur pa dzny'a na tsa kra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110a-32: rtogs na yon tan ma rtogs skyon //
T02TD2453E:110a-33: gang gis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD2453E:110a-35: gnyis med shes bya dngos po'i gshis //
T02TD2453E:110a-37: nyin mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos ba bha nu ha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110a-38: rtog pa 'dzin pa'i nyer len byed //
T02TD2453E:110a-39: des ni srid pa'i 'khor lor bcug //
T02TD2453E:110a-40: chos rnams thams cad stong pa ru //
T02TD2453E:110a-41: mi rig pa yis bdag tu bzung //
T02TD2453E:110a-43: don gyi gnad rig pas 'dzin rtog grol pa pradzny'a tsandra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110a-44: gnyug ma don gyi lhan cig skyes //
T02TD2453E:110a-45: ma bcos rnal ma rang kha la //
T02TD2453E:110a-46: dran pa'i spu ris brten mi bya //
T02TD2453E:110a-47: blo dpyad zhugs na rtog pa'i gzhi //
T02TD2453E:110b-0: 'khrul @110b pa'i sgrog las grol ba mo su ka le'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110b-1: las dang nyon mongs bag chags kyis //
T02TD2453E:110b-2: rten de grub pa ma yin te //
T02TD2453E:110b-3: 'khor ba gzhi med rang grol la //
T02TD2453E:110b-4: mya ngan 'das pa ji ltar sgrub //
T02TD2453E:110b-6: 'khrul pa'i sgrog chad pa las ye shes shar ba shr'i ratna ma ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110b-7: chos rnams gzhi med rang gi ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:110b-8: don dam kun rdzob gang gis gnyis su phye //
T02TD2453E:110b-9: 'khor 'das rmi lam nyid du'ang med gyur na //
T02TD2453E:110b-10: grub mtha' zhig pa'i lta ba ji ltar smra //
T02TD2453E:110b-12: brda'i go ba longs pa mo ra li dha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110b-13: spros pa med cing skye ba med //
T02TD2453E:110b-14: rnam par mi rtog ma bcos pa //
T02TD2453E:110b-15: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2453E:110b-16: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor rtogs //
T02TD2453E:110b-18: snang ba'i mtshang mthong bas shes pa rkyen dang bral ba ka mo ro'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110b-19: sna tshogs snang ba'i gzugs 'dzin te //
T02TD2453E:110b-20: ma bcos lhan cig skyes pa yi //
T02TD2453E:110b-21: ngo bo las ni ma 'das te /
T02TD2453E:110b-22: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can //
T02TD2453E:110b-24: zab mo don gyi dpal 'dzin ma gha dzu dh'a ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110b-25: rags pa'i dngos por snang ba kun //
T02TD2453E:110b-26: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin te //
T02TD2453E:110b-27: ce ra ce ra snang ba'i dus nyid du //
T02TD2453E:110b-28: phyug rgyu chen po mthong nas yod //
T02TD2453E:110b-30: gnyug ma'i rang ngo mthong bas rtog pas bcing du med pa r'a dz'a me tog ha li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110b-31: dad po 'di ltar snang ba kun //
T02TD2453E:110b-32: phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo ste //
T02TD2453E:110b-33: rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD2453E:110b-34: chu zla'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no //
T02TD2453E:110b-36: zag med bde ba'i mdangs ldan ma ru ka li'i zhal nas /
T02TD2453E:110b-37: mtshon byed dpe ai ldan skyes kyis //
T02TD2453E:110b-38: mtshon bya don gyi lhan skyes rtogs //
T02TD2453E:110b-40: sems nyi da gnyug ma'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2453E:110b-42: zag med kyi shes pa yul gyis ma phrogs pa shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:110b-43: snang ba'i bla mas dngos rnams gdams par ston //
T02TD2453E:110b-44: sngar 'dris mi de mthong bas ngo shes bzhin //
T02TD2453E:110b-45: bla ma'i ngo sprod gnad la zug pa yis //
T02TD2453E:110b-46: chos rnams rang bzhin skye ba med par rig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:110b-47: rang rig 'od gsal gyi mdangs can ma gangga le'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111a-1: po drug gi spyod yul du //
T02TD2453E:111a-2: gang gang snang ba'i dngos po la //
T02TD2453E:111a-3: rang bzhin bden bas dben pa'i phyir //
T02TD2453E:111a-4: stong nyid ci phyir mi gzigs zhes //
T02TD2453E:111a-6: tshe 'di'i zhen ba log ba tsandra sing nga'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111a-7: bla ma'i byin rlabs zhugs pa'i mthus //
T02TD2453E:111a-8: ae wam snying gi dkyil du zhu //
T02TD2453E:111a-9: de yis snang ba'i dngos po 'di //
T02TD2453E:111a-10: rtog ba skye med dang du 'jug / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:111a-11: dpa' mo ye shes kyi mdangs 'phrog ma bha ga dha ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111a-12: tshogs drug yul snang sgyu ma la //
T02TD2453E:111a-13: ngos zin 'khrul ba yul la ldog / gzhi med rang gis stong ba'i mtshang //
T02TD2453E:111a-14: mthong bas bag chags gnas su 'joms //
T02TD2453E:111a-16: rang gi bde sdug khyad du bsad nas gzhan don 'dzin ba pradzny'a pa la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111a-17: rjes la gnyen po bya rab shig / bde pa'i ro la chags pa na //
T02TD2453E:111a-18: sgom ba nyams kyi 'ching ba ste //
T02TD2453E:111a-19: lha ni bdud du bab par 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:111a-21: bzang mo dpal gyi 'od zer can ratna ro ha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111a-22: re ba dang ni dogs ba yis //
T02TD2453E:111a-23: mtshan ma'i chos la rtog pa ni //
T02TD2453E:111a-24: nyams su ma myong skyon yin pas //
T02TD2453E:111a-25: gnyis med rtsi yis zin par bya //
T02TD2453E:111a-26: rang snang rang sar grol bar bya //
T02TD2453E:111a-28: snang ba'i mtshang gis gnyug ma'i ngo bo mthong ba de ba shr'i s'urya'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111a-29: gang zag lam pa'i rgyud la ni //
T02TD2453E:111a-30: re dogs gnyis su byung gyur na //
T02TD2453E:111a-31: lta ba ma rtogs skyon yin pas //
T02TD2453E:111a-33: rang gi sems su blo thag bcad //
T02TD2453E:111a-35: dpa' mo lha'i sgrol ma bha ga dzu lu'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111a-36: blang bya dor bya gnyis byung na //
T02TD2453E:111a-37: spyong pa goms par ma byas pa'i //
T02TD2453E:111a-38: ro ma snyoms pa'i skyon yin pas //
T02TD2453E:111a-39: dang bzhin sems las phyir gyur ba'i //
T02TD2453E:111a-42: shes pa rkyen dang bral bas rtog pas mi 'ching ba d'a na shr'i r'a dz'a'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111a-43: 'phags lam bgrod pa'i dus der ni //
T02TD2453E:111a-44: bsgom bya sgom byed gnyis byung na //
T02TD2453E:111a-45: gnas lugs ngo yis ma zin pa'i //
T02TD2453E:111a-46: rkyen gyi dri ma 'thas pa yin //
T02TD2453E:111a-47: sems do skye med shes par bya //
T02TD2453E:111b-0: spros bral gyi rgyan dang @111b ldan pa bha ba de ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111b-1: mchog gi 'bras bur gyur pa na //
T02TD2453E:111b-2: ma rtogs skyon gyis gol ba min //
T02TD2453E:111b-3: kye ma gang la re ba de'i //
T02TD2453E:111b-4: ma spangs dri ma mi 'dag pas //
T02TD2453E:111b-5: re ba med pa bde ba'i mchog / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:111b-6: phrin las kyis gdul bya'i re ba skong ba badzra rashmi'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2453E:111b-7: snang ba la ni chags gyur na //
T02TD2453E:111b-8: lam khyed ma shes skyon yin pas //
T02TD2453E:111b-9: bden brdzun dngos po'i chos la blta //
T02TD2453E:111b-10: gang la mngon par zhen pa ni //
T02TD2453E:111b-11: 'ching ba'i rgyud de bor de sgrim //
T02TD2453E:111b-13: phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya can ratna kha dha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111b-14: lam du mthong ba'i rtags rnams la //
T02TD2453E:111b-15: bdag brod re bas sngon bsu nas //
T02TD2453E:111b-16: dmigs med rtsi yis ma zin pa'i //
T02TD2453E:111b-17: blo bral ma dag skyon yin pas //
T02TD2453E:111b-18: shes ba'i phu thag gcad par bya //
T02TD2453E:111b-20: thos pa'i mtha' tshig gi thog tu bcad ba tsandra hri da'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111b-21: 'khor ba sdug bsngal du mthong bas //
T02TD2453E:111b-22: dogs bas skyo na gol ba ste //
T02TD2453E:111b-23: yul ma 'byongs pa'i skyon yin pas //
T02TD2453E:111b-24: mkhas pas dogs pa spangs pa na //
T02TD2453E:111b-25: bde ba'i tshad du chud pa yin //
T02TD2453E:111b-27: 'khrul ba chos nyid du shar ba mo ha ra dha na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111b-28: rtsol ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
T02TD2453E:111b-29: ngos gzung bral ba'i nyams myong bskyang //
T02TD2453E:111b-30: bying rgod la sogs byung gyur kyang //
T02TD2453E:111b-31: de yi skyon ngo shes byas la //
T02TD2453E:111b-32: kho na nyid la glod la bzhag / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:111b-33: don gyi gnad rig pas bsam pa'i mtha' chod pa badzra dha li ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111b-34: kye ma kye ma tha mal gyi //
T02TD2453E:111b-35: ma bcos shes pa ngos gzud dang //
T02TD2453E:111b-36: rang gi rang bzhin nyid la blta //
T02TD2453E:111b-37: 'di yi dus su rang snang gi / chos la brtag dpyad spang bar bya //
T02TD2453E:111b-39: 'dod pa'i blo log ma ra sa bhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111b-40: cir snang ngo bos rang grol bas //
T02TD2453E:111b-41: nyon mongs bag chags kyis mi 'og / chos dang sems su ro mnyam bas //
T02TD2453E:111b-42: sna tshogs gzugs med rtsa bral du //
T02TD2453E:111b-43: grol bas smyon pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2453E:111b-45: byin rlabs kyi nyams 'bar bas bsgom thog babs su 'char pa rashmi s'urya'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:111b-46: thams cad sgyu ma las ma 'das //
T02TD2453E:111b-47: rang bzhin med pa'i mtshang go bas //
T02TD2453E:112a-0: nang gis phyi rol byin brlabs @112a * //
T02TD2453E:112a-2: mtsho la 'khyag dar zhig pa bzhin //
T02TD2453E:112a-3: snang ba rang sar grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:112a-5: rig pa snyems las grol ba mo bha ga da nu'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112a-7: des ni gnyis 'dzin shes pa grol //
T02TD2453E:112a-8: 'bad rtsol med par gdul bya yi //
T02TD2453E:112a-9: don 'byung yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
T02TD2453E:112a-12: tshe 'di'i rtsis bshig pas ci byas chos su song ba ratna pa li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112a-13: gzhi la gnas pa'i 'bras bu ni //
T02TD2453E:112a-14: ae ma rang byung bsam mi khyab //
T02TD2453E:112a-15: rang sems skye med do shes pas //
T02TD2453E:112a-16: sku gnyis bsgrub pa'i 'dun ma grol //
T02TD2453E:112a-17: thob bya'i 'bras du phyi nang med //
T02TD2453E:112a-19: nyon mongs pa rang thog tu brnyil [?] ba mo ri bha na di'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112a-20: 'di ni gzugs can ma yin pas //
T02TD2453E:112a-21: dus gsum 'gyur ba med par gnas //
T02TD2453E:112a-23: chos rnams phyag rgya chen po las //
T02TD2453E:112a-24: ma 'das kun la khyab pa'i bdag / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:112a-25: lta stangs kyi gzengs smad pas 'jam rlung thog babs su zin pa gi rti ping nga'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112a-26: gdod nas stong zhing bdag med pa //
T02TD2453E:112a-27: rin chen sems ni phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:112a-28: rgyu las ma byung skye 'jig med //
T02TD2453E:112a-29: ma skyes ngo bo de mthong bas //
T02TD2453E:112a-32: dus gsum rang sar grol ba mo bha ga ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112a-33: sems nyid ngo gsal ngo bos dben //
T02TD2453E:112a-34: sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gyi //
T02TD2453E:112a-35: khyad par yod pa ma yin te //
T02TD2453E:112a-36: mar me dang ni 'od bzhin no //
T02TD2453E:112a-39: rtog pa byin rlabs las 'khrungs pa tsandra pradzny'a li zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112a-40: yid la mi byed don 'di la //
T02TD2453E:112a-42: rang snang ba ni rang gi sems //
T02TD2453E:112a-43: tha dad par ni mi rtog go //
T02TD2453E:112a-44: gnyis 'dzin bral na phyag rgya che //
T02TD2453E:112a-46: rtog pa rang grol nga ra bhe na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112a-47: stong pa nyid la bden pa yi //
T02TD2453E:112a-49: byed mkhan ngos 'dzin 'khrul pa 'jig / de ni gnad kyi gdams pa yin //
T02TD2453E:112b-1: do sprod kyi gnad la nges pa'i shes pa skyes pa ratna bo dhi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112b-2: rtogs pa'i don la mchog 'dzin spang //
T02TD2453E:112b-3: 'dag par dka' ba'i dri ma ni //
T02TD2453E:112b-4: ngo bo mthong ba'i rang nyid de //
T02TD2453E:112b-5: mtha' dang bral ba lta ba yin //
T02TD2453E:112b-7: dbang gi nyams kyis bzi ba mo bha tsa la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112b-8: glo bur rkyen las skyes pa yi //
T02TD2453E:112b-9: dran rig rnam par rtog pa ni //
T02TD2453E:112b-10: de nyid ngo bo gzhi med de //
T02TD2453E:112b-11: rang bzhin ma skyes ba yi gzhi //
T02TD2453E:112b-12: de mthong 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'jig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:112b-13: 'od gsal gyi rang ngo mkha' 'gro ma'i brda las phrad ba kandha ri pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112b-14: rnam par rtog pa chos nyid du //
T02TD2453E:112b-15: ma shes dbyings kyi ye shes ni //
T02TD2453E:112b-16: mtshang ma mthong bas ngos ma zin //
T02TD2453E:112b-17: ae ma de nyid ltos dang kye //
T02TD2453E:112b-19: mi rtog pa'i gnyid log ma sidha dha na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112b-20: de nyid ngo bo 'dus ma byas //
T02TD2453E:112b-22: spros pa nyer zhi 'ong gsal dang //
T02TD2453E:112b-23: ga dod nas dag pa de los dang //
T02TD2453E:112b-25: gnyis snang gi shes pa grol ba b'irya dza la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112b-26: ma skyes mi skye skye ba med //
T02TD2453E:112b-27: stong nyid las byung skye ba med //
T02TD2453E:112b-28: skye med skye ba'i ngo bos stong //
T02TD2453E:112b-29: rgyu rkyen byed pa po ma grub //
T02TD2453E:112b-31: bde ba'i ros myongs pa mo gha dzu li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112b-32: skye med dbyings las shar ba yi //
T02TD2453E:112b-33: chos rnams skye ba med pa'i bdag / rang bzhin las ni ma 'das te //
T02TD2453E:112b-34: dngos rnams skye ba med pa'o //
T02TD2453E:112b-36: dge ba'i dpal 'dzin bi li ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112b-37: bya ba btang ba'i skyes bu bde //
T02TD2453E:112b-38: 'jig rten pa la sdug bsngal du //
T02TD2453E:112b-39: ma song ba yi dngos po gang //
T02TD2453E:112b-42: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur las dpal gyi be'u'i bcud rnam par 'thigs [?] pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o /
T02TD2453E:112b-44: // / snang ba rgyud la nges skyes pa sa rdza na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:112b-45: las kyi phyag rgya mtshon byed de //
T02TD2453E:112b-46: chos kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i lam //
T02TD2453E:112b-47: phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu ste //
T02TD2453E:112b-48: dam tshig phyag rgya phrin las so //
T02TD2453E:113a-1: seng ge'i rtsal dang ldan pa siddha na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113a-2: mtshon byed med na don mi mthong //
T02TD2453E:113a-3: bsgom bya med na lam dang bral //
T02TD2453E:113a-4: 'bras bu med na bsgrubs nas ci //
T02TD2453E:113a-5: phrin las med na dgos pa stor //
T02TD2453E:113a-7: don rgyud la sgro 'dogs chod pa de ba sha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113a-8: bde ba nyams myong dga' ba ste //
T02TD2453E:113a-9: 'dzin grol nyams myong mchog tu dga' //
T02TD2453E:113a-10: bde stong dbye ru med pa ni //
T02TD2453E:113a-11: lhan cig skyes ba'i dga' ba'o //
T02TD2453E:113a-12: nyams las grol na dga' bral lo //
T02TD2453E:113a-14: bde ba'i 'od zer can bi ma ladha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113a-15: myong bas lus sems rnal du gsol //
T02TD2453E:113a-16: zhon med nyams myong 'dzin pa gro //
T02TD2453E:113a-17: spros bral stong pa bde ba'i nyams //
T02TD2453E:113a-18: shes pa der 'dzin bral ba can //
T02TD2453E:113a-20: byin rlabs kyi rgyud pas chod sel ba shr'i sa ra ba'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2453E:113a-21: rang gnas rtsa ba 'dus ma byas //
T02TD2453E:113a-22: skad cig ma yi mtshang gis rig / tol skyes shes pa snga phyir bral //
T02TD2453E:113a-23: der ni gnyis snang mdud pa grol //
T02TD2453E:113a-25: bzang mo nor bu'i 'od ldan ma dha na la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113a-26: dran rig rnam par rtog pa ni //
T02TD2453E:113a-27: dmigs pa med par mchod na //
T02TD2453E:113a-28: bag chags gnas pa'i rten mi 'jig / mtshan ma rang grol de ltos shig / gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:113a-29: blo rten ma bcas pas mtshan ma rang sar grol pag dzu dha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113a-30: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga //
T02TD2453E:113a-31: sgyu ma lta bur mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2453E:113a-32: gang la rang bzhin med pa ni //
T02TD2453E:113a-33: mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid gcig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:113a-34: rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od zer can radnam ta'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113a-35: chos rnams sgyu ma'i ngo bo la //
T02TD2453E:113a-36: rang bzhin yid la ma yin kyang //
T02TD2453E:113a-37: lam du 'khrul pa ma bsal na //
T02TD2453E:113a-38: sgyu mar mthong bas grol ba min //
T02TD2453E:113a-41: dus gsum ma dmigs pas rtog pa chad pa tha rindha pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113a-42: chun rjes bshig pa shes rab lam //
T02TD2453E:113a-43: chos nyid spros bral 'char ba'i sa //
T02TD2453E:113a-44: rig pa sgrim glod thabs kyi mchod //
T02TD2453E:113a-45: ma rig bsgom gyis gnad mi rtogs //
T02TD2453E:113b-0: dpal gyi bde ster ma @113b su ka ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113b-2: ma shigs rjes kyi ngos mi zin //
T02TD2453E:113b-3: ma bsgribs log shes tshar mi chod //
T02TD2453E:113b-4: ma glod spros bral 'char ba'i lam //
T02TD2453E:113b-6: rtsa ba gzhi med mthong bas gnyis 'dzin grol bag gadha ra'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2453E:113b-7: chos rnams ming du shes par gyis //
T02TD2453E:113b-8: de yis bden 'dzin grol ba yin //
T02TD2453E:113b-9: gnas lugs gzhi med mthong bar gyis //
T02TD2453E:113b-10: 'di yis zag pa'i zug rdu grol //
T02TD2453E:113b-12: dpal gyi sgron ma ka na li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113b-13: 'khor ba'i rang mtshan mthong bar gyis //
T02TD2453E:113b-15: dran rig ye shes ngo bor mthong //
T02TD2453E:113b-16: 'di yis sangs rgyas sgrub blo 'jig / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:113b-17: 'dod ba yid la zhig pas zag med kyi bde ba 'bar bashr'i s'urya'u zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113b-18: ji ltar til gyi 'bru gu la //
T02TD2453E:113b-19: mar gyis khyab par gnas mod kyang //
T02TD2453E:113b-20: skam lam gcun khu ba med //
T02TD2453E:113b-21: til gyi mar gyis don mi nus //
T02TD2453E:113b-23: bum 'dzin ma dha na ru'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113b-24: rigs drug 'khor ba'i sems can la /
T02TD2453E:113b-25: bde gshegs snying po yod gyur kyang //
T02TD2453E:113b-26: ma bsgrubs grol ba thob mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:113b-28: rnam rtog gzhi med du mthong bas gnyen po'i byar las grol ba su ga de ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113b-29: rig pa mdung khyer bsgom gyi gnad //
T02TD2453E:113b-30: ma bsgoms shes pa gnyug ma'i dang //
T02TD2453E:113b-31: bsgoms dang ma bsgoms gnyis med pas //
T02TD2453E:113b-32: shes pa zung 'jug ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2453E:113b-34: bde ba'i mdangs ldan ma bha aa ra dha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113b-35: shes pa mtha' bral lta ba'i gnad //
T02TD2453E:113b-36: tha mal shes pa blo rtog bral //
T02TD2453E:113b-37: ma bcos pa ni chos kyi sku //
T02TD2453E:113b-38: bsgrub blo zhig pa ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2453E:113b-40: lam la gang phan grogs su ston shes pas snang ba dpe char shar ba bha na s'urya'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113b-41: ji ltar sol ba'i sdong po la //
T02TD2453E:113b-43: de bzhin dad pa med pa la //
T02TD2453E:113b-46: ye shes spyan ldan ras ma dha na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:113b-47: mngal du 'phyes pa'i gling po yis //
T02TD2453E:114a-2: rang bzhin brtson 'grus mi ldan pas //
T02TD2453E:114a-3: thar pa'i grong khyer phyin mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:114a-5: seng ge'i lta stangs la rig pa dbangs pa da ra tsa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114a-6: ji ltar rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin //
T02TD2453E:114a-7: kun rdzob snang ba'i dang bzhin stong //
T02TD2453E:114a-8: dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin du //
T02TD2453E:114a-9: skye dang gnas pas de bzhin no //
T02TD2453E:114a-11: lha'i mdangs 'phrog ma ma ni la'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114a-12: 'di dag yang dag ma yin pas //
T02TD2453E:114a-13: khams gsum do pos rnam par dpen //
T02TD2453E:114a-14: chos rnams don du ma grub pas //
T02TD2453E:114a-15: rang bzhin dag pa ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2453E:114a-17: dran pa'i rtsal ngo bo skyes pa tsanda l'i'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114a-18: chos rnams rang bzhin rnam par dag / rgyu med 'khor pa mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:114a-19: ma mthong mya ngan 'das pa'i gnad //
T02TD2453E:114a-20: de rtogs nas ni grol ba thob //
T02TD2453E:114a-21: ae ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i gnad //
T02TD2453E:114a-23: 'bar ba'i gtso mo bha nu hi ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114a-24: blo yi mtha' bral gnyug ma'i dang //
T02TD2453E:114a-25: sgom dang bsgom bya las grol te //
T02TD2453E:114a-26: phyag rgya che la bsgom du med //
T02TD2453E:114a-27: ma byas shes pa ngar dang bcas //
T02TD2453E:114a-28: rig pa rten med nam mkha' 'dra //
T02TD2453E:114a-30: shes pa yul la ma 'phros pas rtog pa chad ba aa su ra dhe'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114a-31: rtog pa mthar phyin 'bras bu'i sa //
T02TD2453E:114a-32: re dogs gol ba dbyings su dag / don rtogs rnal 'byor nyam da bral //
T02TD2453E:114a-33: 'khor ba rang grol ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2453E:114a-35: ye shes kyi spyan ldan ma bha nu ha ri'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114a-36: bden gnyis ngo bo tha mi dad //
T02TD2453E:114a-37: snang stong gnyis med zung du 'jug / snang stong grol ba'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2453E:114a-40: rtsa ba'i gnad kyis rang ngo brda las phrad pa ghatsa li pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114a-41: nges pa'i shes pas skyes pa la //
T02TD2453E:114a-42: the tshom som nyi yid gnyis bral //
T02TD2453E:114a-43: ye shes rgyun chad med pa la //
T02TD2453E:114a-44: skad cig ma yi chos mi gnas //
T02TD2453E:114a-46: dpal gyi 'od 'jom [*'joms?] su ka dha na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114a-47: bar do med pa'i chos nyid la //
T02TD2453E:114a-49: blo dang bral ba'i ye shes la //
T02TD2453E:114a-50: 'khrul pa'i dri ma rnam par dag /
T02TD2453E:114b-1: shes pa so la bzhag pas 'khrul pa'i snang ba la sgrog chad ba tsandhi pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114b-2: rtsi yis zin pa'i lcags bzhin du //
T02TD2453E:114b-3: ngo bo gser du 'gyur ba bzhin //
T02TD2453E:114b-4: bde gsal mi rtogs zin pas //
T02TD2453E:114b-5: dran rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:114b-7: dbyings kyi gtso mo bha ta ha'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114b-8: gang tshe gnad kyi ngo bor rig / de dus ma rig mun pa dangs //
T02TD2453E:114b-9: gang du 'khrul pa'i snang ba dag / de ni sku gsum zhing zhes shes //
T02TD2453E:114b-11: a'a li k'a li'i gnad kyis bka' rgyud kyi don grol ba sho sa ri ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114b-12: gang la gter gyi khron yod na //
T02TD2453E:114b-13: de la chags pa'i blo 'byung gis //
T02TD2453E:114b-14: gter med pa la chags blo med //
T02TD2453E:114b-15: so bya nags kyi khrod mi snyag / ces gsung ngo //
T02TD2453E:114b-16: rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i than mo'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114b-17: rtsi med sprad ma bde bar gnas //
T02TD2453E:114b-18: nya btang skyar mo sems ngal sos //
T02TD2453E:114b-19: chog med blo ni dbul po yin //
T02TD2453E:114b-21: dka' thub kyi srangs tshar bas 'phags pa'i rgyud pa zin pa ratna de ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114b-22: rgyu yi rnal 'byor rkyen las byol //
T02TD2453E:114b-23: lam pa'i rnal 'byor rkyen dang bral //
T02TD2453E:114b-25: rtog pa'i rkyen du gang ma song //
T02TD2453E:114b-27: thugs rje'i 'od ldan ma su ri dha na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114b-28: rgya mtsho nang gi sems can la //
T02TD2453E:114b-29: chu srin zas su ma gyur gang //
T02TD2453E:114b-30: de bzhin brtan pa thob pa la //
T02TD2453E:114b-31: grogs su ma gyur gang yang med //
T02TD2453E:114b-33: 'khrul pa ngos zin pas tshogs drug rtog pa'i rkyen bskul du shar ba aa mo gha tsandra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114b-34: lta med lta dang bral ba la //
T02TD2453E:114b-35: lta ba 'di yin ji ltar smra //
T02TD2453E:114b-36: gzhon nu ma yi bde ba bzhin //
T02TD2453E:114b-37: nyams myong brjod par nus ma yin //
T02TD2453E:114b-39: bde ba'i stobs ldan ma sa na li'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114b-40: gang gis mkhur bar chu blugs na //
T02TD2453E:114b-41: smra brjod nus pa ma yin no //
T02TD2453E:114b-43: phyag rgya chen po brjod mi shes //
T02TD2453E:114b-45: gnad kyi rang mtshang go bas rig pa'i rtsal 'byongs pa su kha dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:114b-46: chu rnams thams cad rgya mtsho ru //
T02TD2453E:114b-47: lan tshva'i ro ru gcig pa ltar //
T02TD2453E:115a-1: pa'i gnad kyi ngo sgrod du //
T02TD2453E:115a-2: chos rnams don gcig go mar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:115a-4: sems la dbang thob par nu dha ra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:115a-5: mig ser gyis ni gzir ba yi //
T02TD2453E:115a-6: sa gzhig ser du mthong ba bzhin //
T02TD2453E:115a-7: de ltar don gyi rtsi 'thungs pas //
T02TD2453E:115a-8: cir snang gdams par mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:115a-10: ye shes bshig rjes la ngos zin pa bi med ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:115a-11: skyes bu bdud kyis khyer ba ni //
T02TD2453E:115a-12: de tshe bdag bstod gzhan la smod //
T02TD2453E:115a-13: rmongs pa'i grub mtha' mngon zhen can //
T02TD2453E:115a-14: 'di ni lta ba'i bdud yin no //
T02TD2453E:115a-16: dpa' mo khyung bya'i lde ma ru can pa li pa da'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:115a-17: mkhas pas khas len spang bar bya //
T02TD2453E:115a-18: thos pas rang rgyud dul ba ni //
T02TD2453E:115a-19: 'di yi yon tan dgos pa stor //
T02TD2453E:115a-20: rig byed mthar phyin zhi zhing dul //
T02TD2453E:115a-22: sna rtser yid bcings pas 'gyu ba srangs su chud par nu tsandra'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:115a-23: ji ltar yol bas bcad pa'i rgyab //
T02TD2453E:115a-24: bum ba la sogs mi mngon bzhin //
T02TD2453E:115a-25: de ltar 'dod pa'i mig btsums pas //
T02TD2453E:115a-26: zag pa phyi ru mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD2453E:115a-28: yid 'phrog rma bya'i lde ru can bha gsu na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:115a-29: gang du gnyis 'dzin grol ba'i tshe //
T02TD2453E:115a-30: de dus 'khrul pa rang sar dag / chos nyid snang ba shar ba la //
T02TD2453E:115a-31: bden pa mthong zhes rab tu brjod //
T02TD2453E:115a-33: ngo sprod gnad la phog pa'i phyag rgya chen po thog babs su shar ba mo tsi ra de ba'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2453E:115a-34: blo mtha' ma mthong lta ba ni //
T02TD2453E:115a-35: shes bya mu las grol bas zhig / snang stong rkyen dang bral ba las //
T02TD2453E:115a-36: skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas bcings //
T02TD2453E:115a-38: bde ldan ma dung gi thor cog can ba ta mi'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:115a-39: 'dzin blo thong la rtog pa chod //
T02TD2453E:115a-40: chos rnams gzhi ru mnyam pa la //
T02TD2453E:115a-41: brgyad dang bral ba rnal 'byor yin //
T02TD2453E:115a-42: ye shes sku ni las las grol /
T02TD2453E:115a-44: ngo sprod gcig gi thog tu chos rnams kun gyi don rig sa gha dzu da ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:115a-45: ji ltar dbang po dangs pa'i mig / long na gzugs rnams mi mthong bzhin //
T02TD2453E:115a-46: de ltar 'dod pa'i blo med na //
T02TD2453E:115a-47: sgrib pas mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2453E:115b-0: gtum mo 'brug gi slag pa can bi ta la'i @115b zhal snga nas /
T02TD2453E:115b-1: gang zhig gzugs med bar du ni //
T02TD2453E:115b-2: de la gri ba ma 'ong ba bzhin //
T02TD2453E:115b-3: de ltar 'dod ba'i blo yod phyir //
T02TD2453E:115b-4: sgrib ba spangs par 'gyur ma yin //
T02TD2453E:115b-5: grogs dag 'dod pa'i blo dang bral //
T02TD2453E:115b-7: nyams kyi man ngag mar me gcig nas gcig tu spel ba'i lugs de kho na nyid rnal du mtshon pa las bdud rtsi'i char rnam par phab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o /
T02TD2453E:115b-9: // / rgyal sras mi'i sang ge rjed ma pa rgya gar rin po che'i zhal snga nas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa /
T02TD2453E:115b-10: phyag rgya chen po du ma bu khrigs //
T02TD2453E:115b-11: tshig tu nyung la don du 'gril //
T02TD2453E:115b-12: nyams myong skyes ba rdo rje'i mgur //
T02TD2453E:115b-13: ma rig mun sel sgron me 'di //
T02TD2453E:115b-14: skal ldan mig gi dbang po yis //
T02TD2453E:115b-15: lta bas mi ngoms blos mi 'khyud //
